title: Rakuten Viber Messenger
description:
Rakuten Viber Messenger is a secure, fun, and exciting messaging and calling app, connecting over a billion people worldwide!

You can do it all with Rakuten Viber Messenger: group chats, disappearing messages, reminders, and more:

Send messages for free
Staying in touch has never been easier. Send a free text, photo, sticker, GIF, voice, or video message, along with many other types of files. Express yourself in creative ways without any cost. Enjoy high-quality messaging with no hidden fees. Viber ensures you stay connected effortlessly. One of the top messaging apps available today.

Make free audio and video calls
Enjoy unlimited Viber-to-Viber audio and video calls to anyone in the world for free. You can even call up to 60 people at the same time! Great for connecting with friends, family, and colleagues :)
Enjoy crystal-clear voice and video quality across all your devices. Viber's intuitive interface ensures seamless calling whether you're at home or on the go. Viber stands out among phone call apps for its reliability.

Experience end-to-end encryption
On by default for all 1-on-1 calls, chats, and group chats, end-to-end encryption allows you to communicate with confidence knowing that all messages will remain private. No one, not even Rakuten Viber, can read your messages. Viber is the most secure app among the top video chat apps.

Make low-cost calls to landlines with Viber Out
Call any landline or mobile phone with Viber Outâ€™s low-cost international calling service. Get a Viber Out subscription to call a specific destination or keep your options open and buy minutes to call anywhere in the world. With Viber Out, stay connected with loved ones abroad without breaking the bank. Enjoy high-definition audio quality and reliable connections for all your international calls.

Open a group chat - Perfect for video calling large groups.
Catch up with friends, family, and colleagues by opening a group chat for up to 250 members. Use polls and quizzes, @mentions and reactions to get the most out of your group! Text and call free with Viber's versatile services.

Express yourself with lenses, GIFs, and stickers
Personalize your chats! Get creative with fun, funny, and beautifying Viber lenses. GIFs and over 55,000 stickers also await you - you can even create your own.

Use disappearing messages
Send disappearing messages in your 1-on-1 and group chats by setting a timer for each message. You can choose how long the message will be available after itâ€™s opened - 10 seconds, 1 minute, or up to 1 day!

Connect in Communities and Channels
Whether it's sports, news, cooking, travel, or entertainment, get the content you really want and connect with others with similar interests. You can even start your own Community or Channel and gain a global following. 

React to messages
React to voice, video or text messages with emojis to express exactly how you feel in chats!

Create notes and reminders
Forward interesting messages, keep meaningful links, and add your thoughts to your notes. You can also set reminders to ensure you never forget important tasks and events. 

Rakuten Viber Messenger is part of the Rakuten Group, a world leader in e-commerce and financial services.

Terms & Policies: https://www.viber.com/terms/

On by default for all 1-on-1 calls, chats, and group chats, end-to-end encryption allows you to communicate with confidence knowing that all messages will remain private. No one, not even Rakuten Viber, can read your messages. Viber is the most secure app among the top video chat apps.

Rakuten Viber Messenger is part of the Rakuten Group, a world leader in e-commerce and financial services.

summary: Enjoy secure messaging & calling. Safe Messenger: group chats, calls, messages.

scraped_reviews.content: It keeps on throwing notifications even if I already dismissed it from the notification panel. I just wonder, is it really does not make any sense if I dismissed notification, that I don't want to see it in notification panel more than once ? No updates since my last comment... Can't use the app on a new phone. Not receiving a call. Now it says that I've exceeded number of login attempts. No other option to login!?!?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Andrei, thank you for contacting us. We apologize for the issue you are facing with activation and would like to help you with the onboarding process. Can you please send us your number using this link: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: viber can't even verify my number. All I did was clear my data because it was taking up space and when I tried to relog into my account, it said "activation failed" and can't verify me. this is the most frustrating thing i've had to deal with and a lot of people have similarly told me they also can't get their accounts unlocked. Its also impossible to reach a live person for support and i don't think my ticket requests will actually be taken seriously. this is one way you will lose customers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jun, thanks for reaching out! Kindly provide your ticket number so we can look into it and expedite the process.

scraped_reviews.content: this is like one of the worst texting apps ever I do not get why so many people use it (to the point it's impossible to communicate without it because most people only have this app). It crashes so much won't let me end a call when I accidentally call someone everything is glitchy and takes too long to send my texts even tho my wifi is perfectly fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Anast! We really want to help out, but we need some more information to better understand the issue and find a way to fix it for you. Can you please share it here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: TOO MANY ADS. I love this app and have been using it for many years. however, recently, there have been a LOT of short video ads that pop up on the bottom left of the messaging screen, especially for the desktop version. I gotta say they are REALLY distracting, and every time I get on the app to send a message, they frustrate me so much that I exit the app and force close it, looking for alternatives. I really hope they will make the ads less invasive and distracting.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Sam, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We're actively investigating this issue and collecting information from users who are experiencing it. Would you mind sharing more details? You can do so here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: It's an awesome app .this app has a lot of different options rather than others, such as wonderful stickers and delete option works whenever you want , and the edit option is so much helpful. The new update has something that, in my opinion, is annoying when use stickers jump up at the first line .would be better instead of this, we could make stickers in order as we like and want. I mean, organizing them as our priorities would be great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Asal, thank you for your feedback! We're delighted to know that we were able to meet your expectations. Concerning the stickers issues, please contact us via: vb.me/store-en so we can investigate the situation properly and provide the best solution.

scraped_reviews.content: Was 5ðŸŒŸ, as time goes by, it gets worse. With 2nd or 3rd updates in a row, all my messages are gone, had to re-register over and over again, didn't happen before the latest updates released. If it ain't broken, don't fix it! Remaining issue, while GPS is on app can't find my location, also can't deactivate sharing location thus keeps popping up error msg. Non-sense!! SG7.

Very nice, easy to use. Free calls break up sometimes, but not as often as Skype, and there's not really much noticeable distortion when calling internationally, which is a problem we have when using a landline. Love love love the stickers, sometimes we'll have entire sticker conversations! Definitely the app that I use the most, and a must-have on every device I use.

I tried Viber to call Japan back in June and took advantage of the free 7 day trial, but was charged for the first month even though I had canceled it. To their credit, they refunded that money back. I tried them again and everything was great until the call was cut off after 2 minutes. My phone number had been blocked for unusual activity (making a phone call). The unblock bot said "Unfortunately, we won't be able to unblock you". It's the old international calling card scam but with phones.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Please fill out the feedback form at the link: vb.me/store-en In the "Category" section, please select "Viber Out". A support agent will contact you and help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Been using Viber for 10+ years but over the last two years the app has become so unreliable that we're forced to switch now. First message previews stopped working and now it's hit and miss whether (and when) I receive a notification at all. There are also often long delays until messages are delivered - really every basic messenger function no longer works as it should and it's not just me having those problems but the whole family across different phones and OS. What a shame.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mia, please check: 1. Are notifications allowed on your device? 2. Is data usage enabled in the background in Viber? 3. Is the power-saving mode turned off? Also check our article about fixing problems with notifications: vb.me/Fix_Notifications/en If it doesn't solve the problem, contact us: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: Viber has become a bad app and it is getting worse with every major update. I have lost a part of my personal data many times because of an update or a backup restoration. Syncing between android and windows is problematic. Technical support sends you off politely instead of helping. Ads pop up in your face midsentence when you type sponsored keywords. Themes have been removed leaving only black or white option.

Too many intrusive ads. Whenever I make a call, Viber automatically opens 2 shopping apps and my browser. I know you need to make money from ads but there must be a less annoying way to do it. A word to advertisers: Interrupting my calls in the most abrupt way does not make me want to buy your products. As a matter of fact, I make it a point not to buy products with rude advertising.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ed, thank you for sharing your experience! We apologize for the inconvenience and we'll make sure to forward your feedback to the relevant team for further consideration regarding improvements in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Viber is a popular messaging and calling app, but in my experience, it requires a very strong internet connection to work properly. Even with decent mobile data, the call quality is often poor. The voice does not sound clear, and sometimes it is hard to understand the other person. Video calls also freeze or lag if the network is not stable. Compared to other apps,
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Gnawali! Please try the following steps: 1-Switch between different internet connections (Wi-Fi and mobile data). 2-Update Viber and your phone to the latest version. 3-Clear the cache. 4-Restart your device. If the issue persists, kindly open a ticket using this link: vb.me/store-en, and we'll be happy to assist further!

scraped_reviews.content: Iâ€™ve been using Viber for a long time, but recently the app keeps showing â€œNo connectionâ€ even when my internet is perfectly fine. Messages fail to deliver on time, and the app randomly disconnects. Itâ€™s really frustrating, especially when I need to chat urgently. I hope the Viber team fixes these connectivity problems soon because the app used to be much more reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Suraj! Please try the following steps: 1. Switch between different internet connections (Wi-Fi and mobile data). 2. Update Viber and your phone to the latest version. 3. Clear the cache. 4. Restart your device. If the issue persists, kindly open a ticket using this link: vb.me/store-en, and we'll be happy to assist further!

scraped_reviews.content: Loads of ads plus unreliable... this newer version of viber, full of ads, is just a mess. On top of it, maybe the most unreliable chat/call app that's in use. Constantly showing that I have unread messages, while it is "checking for updates", is probably only to direct you to their ads. Shame. Two stars and not one, because I still have to use it a lot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello PÃ©ter, thank you for reaching us. It's possible to completely opt out of ads, this feature is available in the Viber Plus subscription. In the regular version, it's not possible to disable ads. If you come across an ad that seems inappropriate, you can report it by clicking on the flag icon in the top right corner of the ad message.

scraped_reviews.content: horrible horrible service, everytime I try to make a phone call, the other person I call can never hear me because the line keeps cutting out. tried customer service and they were unhelpful and couldn't fix the issue. decided to end my subscription and all of a sudden my account it blocked for some reason, still got 12 more days on my current plan. definitely wouldn't recommend it to anyone.. it's a nightmare of an app and service.. it's a joke...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Robert, thanks for reaching out! Kindly provide your support ticket number so we can look into it and expedite the process.

scraped_reviews.content: Very functional chatting app, and a good alternative to WhatsApp. Definitely underrated as it doesn't seem to have much of a user base in North America. Two things I'd like to see improved: - Make features of group chats like polls available to regular (1-to-1) chats, even if it doesn't make sense - Voice messages include the sound that signals the start of the recording, and that shouldn't be the case
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Philippe, thank you for sharing your thoughts! We'll make sure to forward your feedback to the relevant team for further consideration regarding improvements in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Tried to register with two different Motorolas in Norway (on different networks). User registration clearly doesn't work as intended. And it is not possible to set up the app. As activation codes is not received (via either phone or sms). Tried to bring up the issues with customer service. They do not seem to bother to take the issues further with backend IT (those who are able to fix these general issues with the app, in what might be certain areas or markets). After what I can understand.

Lots of bugs/technical issues; for example notifications or calls not being alerted to a user. The no option of backing up data from desktop, only through the phone app, like it makes a difference if you are using the new Microsoft Windows feature where you use apps on your PC. The Desktop app does not accept virtual cameras like the one OBS provides. You can't, or are limited to not being able to share your screen without a physical camera. Just why? This can be bypassed with Camo Camera app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, please check: 1. Are notifications allowed on your device? 2. Is data usage enabled in the background in Viber? 3. Is the power-saving mode turned off? Also check our article about fixing problems with notifications: vb.me/Fix_Notifications/en Concerning any other issues please open a support ticket here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: recently the notification only says "Service Disconnected" and doesn't fix itself, I've tried everything that used to work in the past, nothing works. I never know if Viber is actually working or not because of that greyed out icon. every update breaks something new, and you have to figure out how to just live with it because there's no live chat to help you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for letting us know, we're sorry you're experiencing this issue. We are aware of it and working on a fix.

scraped_reviews.content: Inconvenient mostly for messages that are not automatically synced when logging in and lose media from old messages. Another big issue is, when you make an account on a pc then log in to a phone there is no way to sync your messages. Very inconvenient especially when this is used for documentation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Eli! Thank you for reaching out. To learn how to back up your chat history, please read this article: vb.me/BackupChatHistory If you need further assistance, donâ€™t hesitate to contact us here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: Viber is my go-to app for connecting with friends and family around the world. Voice and video call quality are consistently excellent, often better than other major messaging apps, which is crucial for international communication. I especially love the Viber Out feature for those occasional low-cost calls to landlinesâ€”it's a lifesaver! The app is always fast, the interface is clean, and the end-to-end encryption gives me peace of mind. Itâ€™s a rock-solid, reliable choice for staying connected

Good application. Would be better if it was lighter on resources and simpler without the annoying stickers and sticker notifications. Personally I would love a "light version" without even supporting stickers, with less notifications about "viber's new features" and smaller storage & ram footprint. Also, could be much better if I could use it on my 2nd phone, and without notifying everybody that I have a new phone every time I switch between devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your suggestion! Weâ€™ll pass it on to our team for further consideration.

scraped_reviews.content: Subject: Feature Request: Automatic Comma Separators for Numbers Dear Viber Team, I would like to request a feature that automatically adds a comma (,) as a thousands separator when typing large numbers in the chat, especially for financial amounts. For example, typing '100000' should automatically display as '100,000'. This feature would greatly improve readability and clarity for users communicating monetary figures. Thank you for your consideration. Sincerely, SNK
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello SNK, thank you for sharing your thoughts! We'll make sure to forward your feedback to the relevant team for further consideration regarding improvements in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: The app isn't useless, but there seems to be a bug in it that causes only 1 of my contacts, to receive any message I send, in 2 separate Viber chats...and when he responds, I get his messages in duplicate in a single chat. It doesn't happen if I message any of my other contacts using Viber, but you can imagine just how annoying conversations can be when every message is being sent in duplicate! I've searched to find a way to fix the issue but there doesn't seem to be a way on our end.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We'd like to begin investigating, but we'll need some more information. Can you send us more details about what you're experiencing? The form is here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: One of the worst apps ever. So stupid about backing up and restoring. Unfortunately I have to use it because other people are using it. After constant freezeng in last month I made full backup (chat and media), reinstalled Viber, restored chats and media and now I have less than 20% of images that I had in my chats. Old ones that I had from previous years are gone... Very disappointing and amateurish. And more: Lot of messages I have on the phone are not sync across other devices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry to hear you're having this issue with the app. We'll be able to look into it with some more information. Please provide some more details here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: Hello Viber team Members, easy to use and talented app. just I want to inform you that, you could easily develop app's translating ability. as you know that there is tooany AI tools for real life translate more colloquial translation. some time translated word is more complex and not able to understand easily. thank you for all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for sharing your thoughts! We'll make sure to forward your feedback to the relevant team for further consideration regarding improvements in future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using a Call Worldwide unlimited subscription (Rakuten Viber Messenger) for a while for calling landline in Croatia. For the last 2 months, unlike before, I can't establish connection: the number I call (the same number I've been calling all the time) is ringing, the person on the other end also hears the phone ringing, but connection can't be established.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Sarko! Please fill out the feedback form at the link: vb.me/store-en In the "Category" section, please select "Viber Out". A support agent will contact you and help you.

scraped_reviews.content: one of the worst messaging apps to ever exist. answering calls always switches you to a shopping app link. when you close that shopping link, it would pop up and interrupt your video call again immediately. unfortunately, it's the standard messaging app in the Philippines
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for reaching us. It's possible to completely opt out of ads, this feature is available in the Viber Plus subscription. In the regular version, it's not possible to disable ads. If you come across an ad that seems inappropriate, you can report it by clicking on the flag icon in the top right corner of the ad message.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I had deleted the app because of connectivity issues on a fast and solid internet connection. It was throwing me out of services I had paid for. But after giving a bad review the developers fixed it and the reinstall worked. I lost all history, almost all messages, and I am afraid all my blocked contacts and privacy controls settings may be lost, putting me in danger. Hopefully it still works...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We do not store chats and user data on our servers. This information is stored in your device's local storage. In order for you to be able to restore your message history, we recommend enabling a backup in Settings - Account - Backup.

scraped_reviews.content: Viber out needs to be fixed. Calling +7 number and 99 of 100 times getting an error phone number is invalid,check if number has + sign. Phone number is fine because it has + and it occasionally manages to connect. Thought that there is some issue with network on that days, but recently after few days not being able to call once, decided to install some other app and now I am able to reach a person on each call, so definitely Viber out issue. Tried uninstall and clear cache many times no help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mykyta, thanks for reaching out! Kindly provide your support ticket number so we can look into it and expedite the process.

scraped_reviews.content: Enshitified. They steal from you in plain sight. Check the rates page, here it shows "pay 19.99â‚¬ get extra 3â‚¬", but the pay button shows 24.99. And indeed i paid more than was advertised. Not, it wasn't google charging extra. Unfortunately how many popular call out apps are there? So, get viber or any other unknown app. Oh and of course, support will joke you around.

There is an issue with viber that for the past 10 mins it has been incorrectly sending notification of new message. I have read all my messages, it is impossible for me to suddenly 100 unread group messages. It is very distracting and annoying. Never had issue like this before. Pls fix this asap!!!!

The notification settings are fine. And please stop with this "Update now and feel the difference". I have updated the app many times and haven't seen any difference. Tell us specifically what's changed.

one star because I tried to activate my acc, the number called yet when I tried to put the right code, it said incorrect. I tried to put a new code but they didn't call nor texted the code. I'm so frustrated and pissed more because they said "can't activate account" after I tried more times.

scraped_reviews.content: This app keeps opening Shopee whenever I make calls. Very annoying and spammy. Also many scammers use this app. Pictures sent via Viber are compressed to hell and back and there's no option to send it at a higher quality. Calling and Ringing status is also confusing for older users.. it needs to be communicated clearer. Ads are inserted in between the message list making the app more cluttered than it needs to be. Scrolling between messages sent in the same week is more cumbersome.

Viber does not send me the SMS code or the activation call for OTP. I tried using mobile data, turning off VPN, and changing devices, but still, I cannot get the code. Why is this happening? How can I fix this problem?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for contacting us. We apologize for the issue you are facing with activation and would like to help you with the onboarding process. Can you please send us your number using this link: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: âš ï¸ Warning about Viber Plus âš ï¸ Viber Plus is a scam. It does not delete messages without a trace, and it will not leave silently. Your activity can still be seen by others, so donâ€™t be fooled by its false promises. Stay cautious and avoid installing or trusting this app. Even if you use your phone number with a Viber Plus subscription, you cannot contact a live agent. The support is useless, leaving you with no real help or protection. So think about it before to buy subscription.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using Viber for a month since September 2. Once one of public groups I joined declined to load new messages, chats and calls were OK. I've cleaned app cache and data today mostly because of issues with groups, installed latest update and all chats are gone. Flawless. Additionally, permissions required for call filtering to work properly seriously slows down the device because of ad (mostly Alfa-Bank Belarus I even never looked for).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We'd like to begin investigating, but we'll need some more information. Can you send us more details about what you're experiencing? The form is here: vb.me/store-en

scraped_reviews.content: I purchased UNLIMITED US Calling Plan on Aug 17. It said I can call to US for UNLIMITED amount of time for 1 month. But starting from Sept 3 the app asks me to purchase Worldwide Calling Plan to make a call. The customer service said that this is because I have reached the maximum limit. I asked him, how much is the max limit? He didn't reply my question, but blocked me from using the service. Why can't he answer my question about max limit? I wonder if this app is a scam.

Terrible app, it's only getting worse and worse. Video freezes and it's delayed, quality is also very very poor. Lately they are killing it with ads, in a way that it's blocking the purpose if the app. For example, when I call someone, the person answers, I hear them just fine, but they don't hear me, so it's a game of "hellos". Then I check my screen and there is an add on. Every single time. So, I need to drop and dial again, and it works fine. Super annoying!

title: Google Play Books & Audiobooks
description:
Dive into a world of stories with Google Play Books! Explore millions of ebooks, audiobooks, comics, and manga â€” all in one app.

  Key Features:

  â€¢ Your library, anywhere: Enjoy books on your phone, tablet, computer, or even in your car with Android Auto. Plus, you can download books to read offline.

  â€¢ Earn Google Play Points: Get rewarded with Play Points when you purchase books. Note: Play Points availability, award levels, and multiplier rates differ by country. Play Points isnâ€™t available in all countries.

  â€¢ Organize with shelves: Personalize your digital library with custom shelves to categorize your books by genre, author, or any theme youâ€™d like.

  â€¢ Smart notes: Jot down notes that sync with your Google Drive and can be shared for easy collaboration.

  â€¢ No subscription needed: Buy only the books you want, when you want them.

  â€¢ Kidâ€“friendly reading tools: Let kids explore word definitions and listen to books aloud. Note: Reading practice tools are available in English only.

  â€¢ Immersive comics: Experience Bubble Zoom for a specialized comic and manga reading experience.

  â€¢ Preview before you buy: Check out samples to make sure itâ€™s the perfect book for you.

  â€¢ Handsâ€“free reading: Control your audiobook with your voice using Google Assistant.

  â€¢ Read your way: Customize your reading experience by adjusting the font, text size, brightness, and more.

  Millions of stories await on Google Play Books! Download now and start reading.
descriptionHTML:
Dive into a world of stories with Google Play Books! Explore millions of ebooks, audiobooks, comics, and manga â€” all in one app.

Key Features:

â€¢ Your library, anywhere: Enjoy books on your phone, tablet, computer, or even in your car with Android Auto. Plus, you can download books to read offline.

â€¢ Earn Google Play Points: Get rewarded with Play Points when you purchase books. Note: Play Points availability, award levels, and multiplier rates differ by country. Play Points isnâ€™t available in all countries.

â€¢ Organize with shelves: Personalize your digital library with custom shelves to categorize your books by genre, author, or any theme youâ€™d like.

â€¢ Smart notes: Jot down notes that sync with your Google Drive and can be shared for easy collaboration.

â€¢ No subscription needed: Buy only the books you want, when you want them.

â€¢ Kidâ€“friendly reading tools: Let kids explore word definitions and listen to books aloud. Note: Reading practice tools are available in English only.

â€¢ Immersive comics: Experience Bubble Zoom for a specialized comic and manga reading experience.

â€¢ Preview before you buy: Check out samples to make sure itâ€™s the perfect book for you.

â€¢ Handsâ€“free reading: Control your audiobook with your voice using Google Assistant.

â€¢ Read your way: Customize your reading experience by adjusting the font, text size, brightness, and more.

Millions of stories await on Google Play Books! Download now and start reading.
summary: All the books you love. On the page or out loud. Anywhere you are.

scraped_reviews.content: I am trying to use this app for both purchased books and uploaded documents in one place. Unfortunately I can't seem to use annotation features on uploaded pdf documents. Many epub format documents are failing to upload to Google Books, even though they work fine in other apps. I am also trying to use the "read alound" feature. Unfortunately the reading controls are really poorly implemented - they are not available in the app itself, but can only be used from notifications bar.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your concern, Alexander. Our product team greatly appreciates feedback. You can submit it via: The Play Books app > Profile Icon > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: 11/15/25 Nothing you have shown on your trouble shooting has anything to do with the problem I have. Now the app is bringing books back I've already read, and the app won't let me remove to to the library. I have three tablets and a phone that has this app on it. My problem is that I'm having problems deleting books after I've read them . I've deleted app and reinstalled. It works a while then stops working. it does it on all 4 of my pieces.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry you're having issues with your book, Judith. We'd be happy to help. Let's try these troubleshooting steps first: https://goo.gle/2Zsbssp. If these don't help, please contact us directly here: https://goo.gle/2QyJZSb. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: The best reading app I've found by far, and I've tried quite a few. While I do pay for every book I read, compared to other apps, that charge per chapter, this app charges a minimal fee per book. For a few bucks I receive the entire book, add free. Also, the quality of books is much better and most I've read are complete stand alone stories. Prices run $3 - $10 per book with well known, best selling authors priced higher.

I was unsure about audio books at first, but the more I explore the app the more books I find to listen to, and finding out what narrators are better then some. I have found myself listening to more and more books now and absolutely love the fact that there are free books as well. some prices are high, but finding out that there are sales quiet often, and being able to find a series where the first book is free gives you a chance to see if you would want to listen to the rest of the series.

â€¢ text to voice needs more voice and speed options â€¢ home page of app should be library with a search tool. â€¢ book suggestions should be a menu item under profile, or a tab in the app. instead, it's always "greeting" me with "here! buy this!" It's hard (at first) to get back to books I've already bought. soon, we won't be able to go anywhere or do anything without damn commercials yelling at us. I'll tell you how i want to spend my money, thank you. Don't shove stuff in my face. It's rude.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your concern, Beth. Our product team greatly appreciates feedback. You can submit it via: The Play Books app > Profile Icon > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: Google Play Books to me, is a great digital book, library edition for any reader on any device. Its interface is easy to understand. However, it can be challenging for some who may suffer from certain brain conditions. The outside looks have a brand emblem that's crisp in colors. Now, I have to be candid, but I have bought some of my fav authors' books, samples, etc. But honestly, I don't like to read and I'm a writer, published. Yikes, I said that out loud! ðŸ™Š Great Book Library, Google. ðŸ’¯

I love Google Books! I like the 'Shelves' that make it so much easier to find books. I don't use it as often as I should, and I hate to say this, because of Kindle. I think most readers have automatically gone to Kindle and it's easy to see why but we shouldn't overlook Apps like this as they have an excellent selection of books, particularly novels, and shelves to add them as you like. I would like to organise mine and eliminate most everything that isn't a novel.

Even very old, out of copyright academic books that Google offers for "free" through the Play Books app can't be separated from the app. (Unfortunately they're rare, and hard to find elsewhere). I recommend against purchasing from this app; apps and software are very prone to failure over long periods of time. You will eventually lose all of your books.

It works well for the most basic of use cases: reading.  But it lacks a lot of features that other reader apps have. For instance, if you want to highlight text on multiple pages... nope! can't do that!  Compare this to what Kindle app offers, or even some of the smaller apps offers, it's very bare-bones. At least the book prices are somewhat competitive!! And syncing books and progress across multiple devices works well.

This app is a good place to keep and read my ebooks. I only have two problems with it; one, you can't manually sort books that are in a Shelf. And two, even though I have the "For You" notifications off, I still keep getting popups for price drops on books I don't want. Not going to be a crybaby bigot over it like some people, though. However, these few issues are not that big of a deal, so I gave the app five stars.

You can't turn pages with the keyboard, at least on Chromebook, once you have clicked on the document with the touchpad. If you exit the book and reopen it, you can use keyboard until you click again, such as to highlight. Highlighting is almost completely unusable, because you have to get just the right gesture (I still don't know exactly) to trick it into highlighting, and it will only highlight a single word. Then it pops up the definition of that word, which often obscures the highlighted word. Since you have to use the handles to expand the selection in a separate step, this is QUITE UNUSABLE. And YOU CANNOT HIGHLIGHT ACROSS COLUMNS! For goodness sakes, get the basic functions of this app to work please!

Not sure what is going on, but possibly a recent update has now made this app very frustrating to use on my Samsung Chromebook. The highlight function doesn't work, instead turning into selecting text. Plus there seems to be some overall buggyness in the app (it occasionally crashes, and it has not saved all my annotations). I rely on this for graduate school, so I'm looking for alternative readers given my troubles with the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mike. Clear the Books application cache by going to Settings on your device, then Apps or Application Manager, Books, Storage, then tap â€œClear Cacheâ€. If that doesnâ€™t help, please contact us directly: https://goo.gl/U60MeZ.

scraped_reviews.content: Does what it's supposed to do without issues most of the time. I never really used it to buy anything, but their books are fairly priced, possibly less than a physical copy in some cases. I prefer either going to the library or buying a physical copy at bargain prices, but whenever I want an e-book, this is 1 of the first places I look. Definitely can give Kindle a run for its money, but it depends on your preference & all. Excellent overall... ðŸ‘ðŸ»ðŸ˜

My favorite book app. I can't afford to buy books, so, I really like the selections that are available. Way more free books and ones I like comparing to other apps. Plus, here you have a choice if you want to purchase a book as to other apps they want you to pay for the app after its downloaded or uploaded. I highly recommend Google Play Books.

Updated: There was external SD card support all along, if it's detected when the app is first installed; but no explicit setting to force downloading to external memory, which I would prefer. If you first download to internal memory, the app will continue to download to internal memory even after inserting a SD card.  Reading experience is pretty good. UI for browsing your library not as simple or intuitive as earlier versions.

I read in the evening and would really like Red text on Black. Google please can you add more flexibility. This reader is pretty marginal to bad. I would love to use Google Play Books more but I do not like the reader. My main complaint is the lack of color choices. I read in the evening, my other readers for free e-books allow Red text and Black background which I find the best for the evening. Are there any other readers for Google Play Books ?? Please. I need more text color options.

Pretty decent app. I constantly read and love being able to pick it up on the go. This app treats voice to text as a media control so you can play and pause which is nice. The main drawback is that you can't choose where it starts reading. You have to go back a whole page if it starts far off. It's not a big deal on the phone, but way more annoying when reading on my tablet.

I have used this app for years and been disappointed for most of that time. I held out hope that eventually someday it would improve but it is almost as if it is abandonware. You cannot group your collection by author, you cannot edit or update book information. There are no "shelves" the ui for what little it can do is ok but really it is average. It is kludgy at nearly every task, including if you want to buy a book. The play bookstore is about what you would expect if 5th graders ran it. and just like the app, no apparent order, no way to sort or really do much of anything. I have 500 books in play books but to browse is just ridiculous. This is a 1-2 star app. It's only saving grace is syncing between devices which it does well. The app is terrible and if you ever try to read on a computer, just don't, it is terrible.  unlike many google apps this one  just never improves. if you upload a book to it, no lie, it then makes you download the book (even if you have it locally already) in order to read it.. I cannot stress enough how bad this app is. I tried another app, not free, but i am getting sync setup so i can just avoid this app from now on. it does not deserve my eyes.

I love this app...... almost to the point of saying it's better than Amazon but I will continue to use both as all authors don't partner with both. My only complaint is where the app recommends "E Books for you" I keep marking some as not interested, the book returns to the "E Books for you" recommendation section. Why? I've already noted I am not interested in that book for whatever reason.

Since my last update all of the book cover thumbnails for epubs I have downloaded are gone, just gray rectangles. This may sound trival, but for we who have trouble seeing this was very helpful. Another thought, your app is looking more like kindle all the time. I switched because liked your version of a year ago. My mistake for updating. Change just for the sake of change or uniformity doesn't always result in improvement. Why limit my review to only 500 characters I see others with much more?

Accidentally deleted a book from my library. Thought it was lost forever. I emailed googleplay books customer service. (Be sure to use the correct email, because one of them is just a no-response, for feedback.) They called back within five minutes, and showed me how to retrieve and delete my books through the chrome browser web page. Very impressed with such a large company providing absolute, top quality customer service.

Help. (april, 2025) issue seems fixed, not too sure how though, still a little slow, rating changed to 4 stars

scraped_reviews.content: It's expensive, it's messy, it's random. The same books can be available at multiple prices. The prices can dive or soar overnight. I love not feeling guilt-tripped by another fee when Iâ€™m not in the mood to read for a stretch. Progress syncs between devices, so if you start a book on your phone and end up reading a few pages on your laptop, it remembers where you left off.

I wish I could afford to buy this but I would want it in hard covered paper form. Also it would have been nice to have a bit longer on the sample I'm a slow reader as my brain to eye to understanding is a bit slower than most due to personal challenges. What I did get to absorb though was a good subject at hand and has offered insight. Please maybe find a more reasonable pricing guide for book of learning and knowledge. Those items, book, and tools for knowledge and learning should never cost.

This app has improved a lot recently. All the bookmarks and notes that I've made are now accessible all the time but the notes column always returns to the top and it's troublesome to use because you have to search all over again every single time you refer to it.

Why is it that after each update, every completed book or newly purchased book, when placed on shelf and download removed not go back to shelf or off home page. It makes book organisation difficult. It was a great app, till you started messing with it. let's just make book removal from home page work. It's the reason for the low score. Could you fix it properly first time? AI refuses to answer question and it offers up irrelevant questions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Natasha. Our product team greatly appreciates feedback. You can submit it via: The Play Books app > Profile Icon > Help & Feedback. Appreciate it.

scraped_reviews.content: Books and (no) Audiobooks. Can't find a single audiobook on that app. none. Classic google "forget about me" app. I think they should remove it and make it into 5 separate apps as they usually do and then forget about them all as well. Way to go whoever is the manager of that project.

title: Roblox
description: ROBLOX â€“ PLAY, CREATE, AND EXPLORE MILLIONS OF EXPERIENCES Thereâ€™s something for everyone on Roblox. Whether youâ€™re looking to explore, create, roleplay, compete, or hang out with friends, there's an endless amount of immersive experiences for you to discover. And even more are being made every day, all from a growing community of creators around the world. Already have a Roblox account? Log in with your existing account and start exploring some of the most popular experiences from the Roblox community today, including Grow a Garden, Adopt Me!, Dress to Impress, SpongeBob Tower Defense, Brookhaven RP, How to Train Your Dragon, and more. WHAT YOU CAN DO ON ROBLOX DISCOVER ENDLESS EXPERIENCES - Dive into adventures, role-playing games, simulators, obstacle courses, and more - Explore trending experiences and fun, new games daily - Compete in multiplayer battles, run your own business, or embark on epic quests CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR - Customize your avatar with your favorite clothing, accessories, and hairstyles - Discover thousands of user-created avatar items in the Marketplace - Express yourself with unique animations and emotes EXPLORE TOGETHERâ€”ANYTIME, ANYWHERE - Play on mobile, tablet, PC, console, and VR headsets - Hang out and play with friends in multiplayer games across any device CHAT AND PLAY WITH PEOPLE YOU KNOW - Join a Party and jump into experiences together - 13+ users can also chat via voice or text CREATE, BUILD, AND SHARE - Design games and virtual spaces using Roblox Studio on Windows or Mac - Publish and share your experiences with millions of players INDUSTRY-LEADING SAFETY AND CIVILITY - Advanced content filtering and moderation - Parental controls and account restrictions for younger players - Clear community guidelines promoting respectful interactions - Dedicated trust & safety teams working around the clock WHY MILLIONS PLAY AND CREATE ON ROBLOX - Immersive 3D multiplayer games and experiences - Safe, inclusive environments for everyone - A platform empowering anyone to become a creator - New content added daily by a global community CREATE YOUR OWN EXPERIENCES: https://www.roblox.com/develop SUPPORT: https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us CONTACT: https://corp.roblox.com/contact/ PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.roblox.com/info/privacy PARENTâ€™S GUIDE: https://corp.roblox.com/parents/ TERMS OF USE: https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004647846 PLEASE NOTE: A network connection is required. Roblox works best over Wi-Fi.

summary: Play, create, and connect across millions of online multiplayer games.

scraped_reviews.content: After the latest update, the game will not open at all on my Chromebook. I have been playing Roblox for years, across several devices and I can't ever recall this happening. I opened the game to play and was told I needed to update it, so I did. Now when I click on it, it begins to open but after about 3 seconds it immediately crashes. I have cleared game cache and reset my laptop, to no avail.

As someone who has been playing for the past 11 years, I feel like I'm obligated to say that this is one of the best platforms out there, otherwise I never would've been playing this long. That aside, there are quite a few issues regarding connection. I'm on a brand new phone, a 2025 MotoG Stylus 5G, but it almost always kicks me using error code 279, when there is no problem with my Wi-Fi. Please, fix this, otherwise my rating will keep going down.

I have played this game for a LONG time. It will always hold a special place in my heart. Although the game is fun and has a LOT of games there are some technical issues... like Al oat every game I get onto glitches it's not a device problem because it brand new but the game does get boring most of the time it needs more action games! So roblox, keep it up!

This is one of the best games I have ever played! There are multiple different servers that are in this game with different things to do like to replay, do an obsticle course, ect. If you get bored of the server you on you can switch to another in less than a minute. The only downside is that some of the more complex games can be laggy. It is a great way to connect with people and play games with friends you already have! I deffinantly would recommend getting this game!

I know this sounds ridiculous considering the fact that my *CHROMEBOOK* was probably made in 2015, but this game just lags so much, I almost cried tears of joy when I rejoined after a break to find that it wasn't in slideshow mode anymore. The lag is definitely an issue though, and the game is pretty old, so I suppose it should still have compatibility.

Roblox is fun. It really is. The only problem(and it isn't a huge deal, but updates haven't fixed it and it's really annoying) is that for a couple of months now, whenever I open the app, it says I don't have a wifi connection and I have to click "retry" every time. Great game otherwise! One thing I think you guys should add though is maybe we can get refunded for things we bought in the past. Anyway, great game! It's really fun, but these were js a few things to know!

It's a fun experience There are different activities like teamwork, puzzles, there's also where you can make good friends but also you can sit and relax in some games but if you want hard games there's battle games. but there's also learning where if a games hard you need to find a way how to over come the challenge\ obstacles. so I hope roblox can change your experience in the games you like. you can build your own games for others to enjoy! you can have so many fun games. hope you like this!

It is impossible to delete your account! Not possible in the app. No matter how many times you figure out how to contact the proper support to delete it, they will not! It should be illegal that they refuse to delete your personal data! They have it forever. I give up and deleting the app from phone. No more time and effort on my end. But it ain't right, it's a game I tried for an hour. Support: DO NOT reply stating you will assist me in the deletion if I contact you via app, it's a lie.

It's really good! A vast majority of games to play, you never get bored! The only problem is it gets very laggy even with 17 GB of free storage space and semi-good internet, also in first person, the mouse moves for some reason and then sometimes when I click it doesn't respond, and I have to press esc and then resume the game, I've played Roblox on Windows, no issue, but the Chromebook... eh I don't know.

Awesome game! it just gets so laggy for my phone sometimes, lol. But highly recommend this game for ages 8+. It is a great opportunity to make friends and find games in your own style, weather it's animals, dress up, or even just a hang out place! My personal favorite games are Adopt Me, Grow a Garden and Brookhaven! Highly recommend those three. Anyways, thanks for reading. i hope you enjoy playing this game as much as I do! :)

I keep trying to use advanced options to add more accessories. But no matter how much I click any different section, Say like the body, Clothing, Accessories, Animations, Any one of them. I can't even go to it, It doesn't let me. Further more I can't use all the accessories I want to buy. Can you PLEASE fix it? I haven't been able to use it for 5 years by now.

Honestly, this is a masterpiece of a game, many "experiences" to choose from & play! Roblox has something for everyone! I feel like we all had issues with lags, EVEN IF our WiFi is fine! The game keeps crashing or not even working in some instances like I can't play one game without other players looking like they're running in place or teleporting or I freeze for no stupid reason. It's due to the constant updates literally nobody has asked for. I doubt the developers read these, but FIX IT PLS!

I love this app. Millions of games to choose from, although a lot of them are just copies/ripoffs of other games. Also, the refund system is a little confusing. Edit: I've found a new glitch and I don't know if it's just me. Roblox exits out of fullscreen whenever I accidentally turn my phone sideways. Whenever I click fullscreen mode, it kicks me out of Roblox entirely and I have to rejoin EVERYTIME. It's annoying.

This is a nice game, but sometimes it's super annoying cuz, when i join a game it suddenly kicks me ot even tho i haven't done anything yet. And when i play on my phone, when i just want to move my character, it moves the screen as well, which is really annoying. Also, can we talk about the number of Inappropriate games and players here?? like, I'm just playing and some player is suddenly FLIRTING with me, also there are actual KIDS playing this game.

Not sure if it's a bug...Why is it when I "Switch Accounts," my other accounts gets logged out? I mean I can log into it again, but what's the point of putting that feature if it's just gonna log out my other accounts anyway? Not to mention, why do I keep crashing in game despite my WiFi being OK? Pls fix ur bugs instead of doing updates no one asks for.

I have been playing Roblox for 6 years. There are a lot of games to choose from across various genres, so you'll definitely find a game to get hooked on! Although not a lot of items are free, you can get some freebies on the marketplace to customise your avatar with. For me, I use this platform to connect with my friends and other players, through the chat features in-game and group walls. It's so fun getting to mingle with other like-minded players through Roblox!

The app is amazing I love all the games you can play and everything, but something that is bothersome is that- you can't really alter the hair as you do with accessories. I wish we could layer and resize hairs, that would make the avatar experience much more BETTER!! a game with many games in it should have options and alternatives, just my opinion.

Roblox is less of a game, and more of a platform for gaming. You can find nearly anything you're looking for, and plenty of great times which you hadn't expected! From strategy and action which requires your constant focus, to casual times which help you relax and unwind, there's bound to be something for you here!

Ever since a simple internet problem one night causing me to disconnect multiple times, after it was fixed I've been getting error code 268 ever since. or better known as "unexpected client behavior" I have never once thought of exploiting and I haven't done anything of the sorts, and yet I get this error.. I've even went as far as resetting my entire phone, to no avail, please contact me to resolve this issue if possible, no others have no problem in my house hold besides me.

Roblox is a very fun game, especially since I customized my avatar. My avatar was very cool and cute, and I couldn't wait to play with it, but a lot of the games keep deleting bits of my avatar. It makes me bald and gets rid of my shoes, revealing worse ones underneath. It looks like a mess. I have made sure the game didn't need updates, and I retried putting them on, but nothing works. If you could fix this that would be great. ( Its the gray sneakers and the short and sleek blonde )

I've been playing Roblox for a while since 2017. but there are a lot of problems about this app, First I can't log in and it's always "Something went wrong. Try again later" with a Good WiFi. I kept clearing the Cache, Data then Uninstall and reinstalling it back but still the same problem I got. Second there's something wrong about going to experience servers, and I'm stuck at the white screen without a Loading Icon, I kept Refreshing it and now the icon is stuck too. fix it ASAP

The game is extremely fun with a variety of games to choose from. Based on your preference, u could play battlegrounds games, simulator games, role play games, or anime based games. Although some people complain about bugs, there really aren't that bad. The camera zoom-in zoom-out might be a problem but it's really easy 2 solve by clicking the roblox icon on the top left or just leave(it's not that bad.) Overall, the game is the GOAT with a multitude of games which are all different.

This mobile version of Roblox is alright, and although there are a few features missing from it that are in the computer version, it is usable. There are a few glitches with the app however, like the movement stick drifting randomly, the camera tilting randomly, some buttons won't respond when pressed, the camera won't move when it's supposed to and move when it's not supposed to, textures not loading in properly, and many more. This causes me to unfairly lose in some games, and I want it fixed.

The game is good, the graphics are perfect. But there are perhaps a few problems that I could explain here. Can you fix them? I always get an error when trying to sign up or log in. I also can't switch between accounts. Does anyone like me have this problem? 9/10 game. Still good, even if there is a logging issue. [I forgot to take a screenshot or record, so maybe you don't believe me.]

Great game! I've been playing for almost 8 years now and I have not gotten bored. This is one of my personal favourites as it has lots of different categories of games, the creativity never ends!. There are a few bugs and issues but that's not a problem for me :) Looking forward for further updates! (I'm loving the increase in maximum friends update. It's the best update so far in my opinion).

I really like Roblox I play it when I'm board. I love the different varieties of games without having to download. Only issues are it using up the battery and heating up my phone and sometimes the view of your character will glitch and you can only zoom in and out but I figured out to fix it you just need to open the menu. I also recommend adding a "play later" playlist for games that you want to play but you don't have time or maybe just playlists in general.

it's absolute hell to play on the phone. the camera keeps glitching and the joystick keeps moving in the opposite direction on where I'm supposed to go. Please fix this since it's unplayable and really glitchy. Additionally, the jump button is really small and whenever I play games where you're supposed to jump, it just doesn't jump because my thumbs are big

I love the game,I can play with my friends, meet new other people,and etc. I've been playing this game for like 3-4 years,but the reason why I gave a 3 stars is because when I play it in my mobile phone,my joystick and jump button often won't show in the screen. Like when I play a game,I wait for everything to load but my joystick and jump button won't show. I have to rejoin and rejoin until it appears back,I don't think it's my mobile device cause this also happened to my friend's friend.

â­â­â­â­â­ Endless Fun and Creativity! Roblox is an incredible platform where you can play, create, and explore countless games. The variety of experiences is amazingâ€”from action-packed shooters to relaxing roleplay games. I love how you can customize your avatar, make friends, and even develop your own games. The events and updates keep it exciting all the time! Definitely a must-have for gamers of all ages!

This game is good, even very good, but almost every game has its problems. Let's start with the good: 1)Yes, I understand that in many experiences there is a lot of donation, I also understand that itâ€™s not you who bet huge donations in games, but take this information to your mind and make at least the game currency a little cheaper.2) Quite a lot of bugs with controls. Sometimes the jump button just freezes and you jump endlessly, but this problem can be solved:open the roblox menu. Bye dev!ðŸ™ˆ

Amazing game, but sometimes its laggy there is no particular lag but over all this is MY FAVOURITE GAME EVER! Keep up the good work! But there is one thing that bothers me, why, in order to play, do I have to update? like it would be better if we could play without having the necessity to update. some people may not have storage and it could be upsetting for them to not be able to play the game just because they don't have storage! Please make it still playable without having the latest version

Great game. I've played for years, even since I was a kid, and now I'm a teenager. But there was an update on roblox and now I'm unable to disable voice chat completely. I can mute and unmute. I just can't disable voice chat. It's really frustrating whenever I decide to play a game by myself and listen to music. My music can't play normally, and it has to sound trashy because voice chat is enabled. I'm hoping you could put the option to disable it back

Roblox is a fun game containing multiple different types of games to choose from and play. I really like how you can customize your characters and play with friends around the world. But sometimes it kicks me out of some games, I don't know why, and it's not because of my Wi-Fi. It's still a good game to try out, also, it helps to pass time when waiting for something or someone.

It's a pretty fun game, large variety of experiences I can choose and play. However, I have a lotâ€”no, a lot is an understatement. I have TOO MUCH internet problems, discarding the fact that my wifi is stable. I kept getting disconnected even if my internet is completely normal, and I hate to use mobile data all the while. Overall, it's nice. But do keep an eye on this problem, it's repetitive...

I've been playing this game for awhile now and my experience has been pretty fun! The games were really intriguing and exciting to play with, and the option to create my own avatar is really an add up to the creativity. I suggest adding the face accessory option to 2-3 and allowing hair layering, there can be ways to accomplish this but i think it would be more convenient to add it into the official app. That's all and god bless everyone!

Love the game! Unfortunately: 1. If you stay online too long (later into the night) on otherwise family-friendly games players often break rules and act inappropriately. 2. Buying Robux (in-game currency). Sometimes it glitches, tells you that you have received money, and gives you none. (I've been told it can sometimes be fixed if reported, but unfortunately don't have enough time to do so) 3. Small glitches on mobile like the camera sometimes zooming in and out when you walk. Thanks!

Two stars, its good as an online social game with lots of games free to play. There is a lot of bugs though, first the chat moderation is so strict, it tags everything that i chat even if its normal like "ok" or "yes". In mobile there is the joystick and jump bug also, there is the random lag spikes too in certain situations. Please fix all of them, they are ruining the experience.

Lovely, until the damned update on parental control, I'm not very comfortable giving you my literal ID, and there is no way else around. I can't even play SPEED DRAW IN UTTER PEACE. It's Speed draw! You just draw some stuff, send it, vote it, done! Now I can't even play games with my friends because of the damned, atrocious, demonic, awful parental control! It's so restrictive!

I really love Roblox, I have been playing it throughout almost my whole childhood. But there is still some issues. Like for example no matter how many times I update or delete the app and reinstall it. It still bugs out has has glitches. I love Roblox but the bugs I have are so bad sometimes it freezes my computer or phone. One time it froze my computer to the point where I could not even turn it off or on. And I had to charge it and hard reset it for it to even work again.

This game is nice, which we can change avatar, playing any games playing and make friends. But I really wanted to say there's a bug in this game or is my device is old. First, Whenever I play games, is like laggy and my WiFi is bad. When I check is all good. Second, again when I play game. Is auto leave, like example I don't want to leave but it leaves too. Last, i tried to join my friend, and then I didn't even walk or chatting something and is auto leaving. I hope you fix this.

The game is good overall, it has many fun opportunities and it's pretty welcoming for everyone. However, these new updates are getting out of hand. Removing the class heads, faces, CLOTHING, R6 etc?? This is all ridiculous. I personally prefer classic clothing because they're cheaper and just look better!! If you keep doing this you'll lose more customers and players. Just keep all of it and you'll survive. I miss the old Roblox.

This game is nice and all, but there is a very Major problem that started appearing... It isn't playable on mobile because of how much Wi-Fi it requires, it isn't even sensible anymore, can't play a game without getting disconnected for apparently having bad internet connection when I have good internet speeds... It was amazing in 2015-2022, but now it's just unplayable

First off, good things about this game. It's really really good for making friends, also for finding games you'd love, even if your tastes are specific. Now for the bad, the censorship is just awful, I've had people spell out curse words in the chat and have nothing done but saying a completely normal sentence can get it tagged. Secondly, it's really glitchy, crashing & lagging randomly and I still can't verify my phone number due to a glitch.

Great platform to create your own little game. Just don't be like Preston and use it as a source of income. The only way to get a huge is to buy them off eBay or to pay for passes or be afk for 4days straight, yes that's right, straight, game needs to be running 24/7. The odd for a huge is 1-1t chances.i will be playing games with better chances like it was intended

I absolutely love this app, I have an OBSESSION with dress to impress, but that's what makes me so sad I will do the round be looking cute and then on runway it will kick me and it does this all the time, it is very frustrating especially when I am playingg with friends or just rly loved the theme. Other than that this is my favorite game

Edit : The keyboard bug is now fixed which it helps a lot, the auto translation system needs to be improved since it won't work on other languages, and the side menu button which between roblox icon button and chat button could be customized just to make it more useful than just trying to scroll down for respawn button

I only play 99 nights in the forest but I'm still leaving a review. for one the constant glitches are unbelievably awful. I'll be killing a wolf and it will have no health left and suddenly all it's health respawns and I die. next, it's a video game, so there's no stock. that's not how it works. I've waited over a day trying to buy alien and I'm still waiting. it's ridiculous. however there are good things about it. pelt trader is great. also, lower the starvation bar.

Roblox is really a great game, and I love playing it, especially going on hiking adventures. However, lately, Iâ€™ve been experiencing constant lag even though my Wi-Fi connection is stable. Iâ€™ve already tried several things like checking my internet speed, closing all other apps, and even restarting my device, but the lag problem still continues. So my rate is 3 stars for now but I hope this issue can be fixed soon so I can enjoy playing better.

roblox is a fun game, I've played it for a few years with my friends and I'd definitely recommend it if you want to play. just two things, PLEASE make the jump button bigger for the mobile players. it feels like it's getting tinier every update. and change the friend request notification to somewhere else, it's really annoying when i jump and accidentally accept a friend request i didn't want. that's all, honestly

I kept getting disconnected even tho my Wifi is perfectly fine and it says error code 2 or something. Please look into it , I cannot play game or play with my friends. I really enjoy playing Roblox but please look into the errors because some of them doesn't make sense. If you could please look into it and thank you for listening to our complents and also fixing them. I also love the events , they're really fun to play . I have social anxiety so Roblox really help me find new friends and find.

Lots of errors in app. Credit card info like a full list of recent transactions is obfuscated at Best and hidden from the user at worst. Very frustrating. Best Buy has really nose dived.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Good Afternoon. We absolutely understand how you are feeling after technical issues while using our app. We would be happy to assist you with these concerns. Please contact us here: bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com. Kindly, ^Bobby

scraped_reviews.content: Literally impossible to navigate this app. The interface is slow, I will apply 1 or 2 filters for my search and once I click on a product, then try to exit back to the results it just clears all the filters. I'm constantly seeing a blank "loading" screen as well. This app needs some major work, I'm skipping buying my fridge through best buy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi.Having concerns with using the Best Buy App can be difficult. We would be glad to support you and take your concerns down if you would like to reach out to us on any of our social media profiles below with Review 52986. Facebook (https://bby.me/cttmg7), Twitter/X (https://bby.me/fj3g6k), Instagram (https://bby.me/8lfy3y)

scraped_reviews.content: The website is moving very slowly. I keep trying to filter my search, and it's still showing me refurbished items, priced items out of order by increase or decrease. The search is unreliable at best, and there is no option to avoid showing me items on the marketplace. I just want to see Best Buy products.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review here on the Google Play Store. We can certainly understand your frustration with our app not running optimally. We'd be more than happy to take into this for you. For support, please contact us at bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: This review is for the app, not the company. The app used to be pretty decent. The change to marketplace caused the entirety of the apps functioms to run slower, less intuitively and anti-customer. Searching is difficult and sluggish, with most results being mostly marketplace items with no filter option. It also often returns results that are not accurate to the search criteria. I used to app often, and it is infuriating to see a simple switch cause a lot of issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review here. I can understand expecting our app to be functioning smoothly. We apologize for the trouble you've had with the app, and are happy to take a look into this. For support, please contact us at bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The app is never accurate.It doesn't let you know what's actually available in the store.It shows you all this availability. then, when you order something from another best buy, that's in another state, you definitely won't get your item.If you pay for it and have it shipped, they have so many restrictions on packages. just ridiculous. I've never had a positive experience with best buy. Their geek quad is also a joke. nothing is ever available at these best buy stores like it shows online
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for sharing this. I can appreciate not being able to open our app, wouldn't be welcome. We'd like to look into this with you. Please email bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com, to get started. Thanks! ^ Melissa

scraped_reviews.content: This app is poorly optimized. Anything you tap on takes at least 3 seconds before something happens. This causes so many mistakes to happen. The Drops feature, which is only accessible from the app shouldn't have to be buried in the Home page. The share button doesn't appear consistently on product pages. I think I'm better off either using the web version on my browser or sticking to the Desktop experience, which isn't that much better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for taking the time to review our app. We appreciate the recommendations that you've provided on how we can improve this to make it a better experience. If you can email bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com, we'd be happy to look into it further.

scraped_reviews.content: Trash app. Too much nonsense on the home screen, confusing notifications, no easy access to saved/highlighted product drops. I have never succeeded at a high demand drop on this p.o.s. app--the few times I manage to get in line, it sits spinning, trying to verify an account that I'M LOGGED IN ON. And it forcibly made me update during a drop once. Utter garbage.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thanks for taking the time to review our app. We understand not finding the information you needed or being able to get the items you were hoping to purchase, isn't ideal. Feel free to email bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com, so we can review this further with you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is slow and laggy, offers no performance increase over using a browser. Best Buy, much like Home Depot and some other big sites, have this awful design aspect where each page takes forever to load. I'm better off opening each page as a new tab and moving between those when comparative shopping. Also, this app offers no immediate indication of open box items on the product page like the browser does. Deleting and happily going back to my browser so. have one less app running.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Good Afternoon, Adam. We absolutely understand how you are feeling after performance issues occurred during your use of our app. We would love to partner with you and work to assist you. Please contact our team here: bestbuymobileapps@bestbuy.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Ordered an on sale computer that was showing as in stock to ship. Evidently they do not keep good track of inventory as the product did not ship on the date shown. After 3 weeks of chats and a phone conversation I was promised they had found some of the HP's and it would be shipped. Today, Oct. 4 the order was canceled by Best Buy, I called and spoke with customer service, obviously outsourced to another country. the did absolutely nothing to make it right. NEVER trust online purchases!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Having an order cancel after issues is frustrating. If you would like to formally document your experience, please reach out on social media. Please include Review 51601 in your message. Here are the links to our socials: Facebook (https://bby.me/fzppxv), Twitter/X (https://bby.me/a2rpgw), or Instagram (https://bby.me/bjphfg)

scraped_reviews.content: I bought a graphics card and did the whole process to redeem my free copy of Boarderlands 4 and got a prompt saying it was no longer available even though I got the code a couple of days ago. Classic Best Buy SCAMMING their customers. You shouldn't use this company which scams their customers. I had to learn the hard way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback, though we wish you had a better experience. We'd like to hear more about it. Please reach out to us on Social Media, so one of our specialist can work with you. Please be sure to add "Review: #45918." You can find us: https://bby.me/bknn1f, https://bby.me/zayi0s, https://bby.me/tfmui7.

title: Sweat: Fitness App For Women
description:
Train at home or in the gym with one of the worldâ€™s largest womenâ€™s fitness communities! Get the fitness motivation you need with Sweat, a personal training app featuring co-founder and elite head trainer, Kayla Itsines. 

Sweat offers a broad suite of challenging, yet achievable programs with workouts you can do anywhere, anytime to progressively build your fitness. New programs give you more ways to push yourself and get you closer to reaching your goals. Stay accountable with virtual community challenges and feel supported by like-minded women everywhere.

Join Kayla and Sweatâ€™s other world-class trainers: Kelsey Wells, Britany Williams, Cass Olholm â€” and more! â€” on your journey to discovering fitness confidence.

All new members get exclusive access to a free trial.

Find a training style you enjoy with easy-to-follow beginner, intermediate and advanced workouts, including:
- HIIT (High-intensity interval training)
- Circuit Training
- Bodyweight exercises
- Powerbuilding
- Strength training
- Yoga
- Barre
- Pilates
- Recovery
- Cardio
- Pregnancy and postnatal

Train your way â€” follow a program or work out on demand. Choose workouts that suit your lifestyle with no equipment, free weights or machines and express workouts when you are short on time. 

Sweatâ€™s features make it simple to stay on track and keep on top of your progress. Features include:
- Exercise descriptions and video demonstrations
- Exercise substitutions to make movements harder or easier
- Trainer audio cues
- Log weights used during gym-based programs
- Planner to schedule your workouts and track your weekly progress
- Share â€œsweaty selfiesâ€ with your friends and the Sweat Community to keep motivated
- Comprehensive education section covering fitness, nutrition and wellbeing
- Over 200 fresh & fast meals for every lifestyle
- Daily step and hydration trackers
- 24/7 access to the Sweat Community

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Sweat is free to download. Ongoing use requires an active subscription, available on a monthly or yearly basis. New customers who choose a monthly subscription are eligible for a free trial period. Yearly subscriptions are billed the total annual fee from purchase date. Monthly subscription users are billed per month.
Payment will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing.
Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Google Play after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at https://www.sweat.com/privacy
