scraped_reviews.content: I like this app from time to time. but right now it's not sending my messages, it took nearly 30 minutes for it to let me see a message. the only reason I am still using it is because I can't afford I real number. but I don't really care for this app anymore. I have to many problems with it, most of the time it doesn't send my messages, I can barely receive any messages until half an hour later. I would give it zero stars if I could
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, weâ€™re sorry to hear youâ€™re having trouble, thanks for letting us know. Can you please provide all details of your issues and email community@textnow.com? Weâ€™d like to find out how we can help improve your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: I have identified a critical issue with the service. I was subjected to recurring charges, and my assigned number was reallocated due to infrequent use. Furthermore, I encountered difficulties making calls while utilizing a VPN. The overall service quality, including call clarity and user interface, is significantly substandard.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, in order to help improve your experience with TextNow we'll need to get some clarification to determine how we can help with any issues you're experiencing. Please email community@textnow.com with more details for additional assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be very good, now, no calls come through. Every call, the phone have not ringed in weeks or months and it just goes to voicemail now. This is irritating and I may have to go to another app, delete my account and then uninstall this. it's becoming useless now. Anyone else with this very annoying issue? How to fix it?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there, we apologize that you are having trouble with phone calls. If you need assistance, you can email us at community@textnow.com and we can look into that for you!

title: Bolt Food: Delivery & Takeaway
description:
Order your favourite dishes to your doorstep with the Bolt Food delivery app. Whether youâ€™re dreaming of sourdough pizza, craving tempura sushi, or desperate for an artisan burger â€” breakfast, lunch, dinner or a snack â€” Bolt Food to the rescue! Don't waste time Googling "food near me" or "places to eat near me" â€” stay in with Bolt Food! 

Bolt Food app features:
â€¢ An easy-to-use, intuitive interface
â€¢ Same day / instant grocery delivery with Bolt Market
â€¢ Order and collect with our takeaway/pick-up option
â€¢ Real-time order and delivery tracking
â€¢ Convenient order scheduling in advance
â€¢ Seamless in-app payments

Bolt Plus is now available!*
With Bolt Plus, you can get access to exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

How to make an order with the Bolt Food delivery app:

1. Set your delivery address
2. Pick a restaurant or supermarket & choose your meal, food or groceries
3. Tap to order and pay
4. Track your order and watch the courier arrive
5. Enjoy!

Bolt Food was created by ride-hailing tech company Bolt and is challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry all over the world, while helping shops and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn extra money.

Make some extra cash with your car, bike or motorbike. Become a Bolt Food or Bolt Market courier: https://food.bolt.eu

Become a Bolt Food partner restaurant here: https://food.bolt.eu

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/boltfoodFB

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in select markets and cities.

scraped_reviews.content: If you have an option to pay cash on delivery, use that. I ordered food, the rider was unreachable, tried calling several times to give instructions. I placed my phone down for a few minutes, I came back, two missed calls 3 minutes back. I called, unreachable. I checked the app only to see they wrote it was delivered. I msged bolt, they claimed they cancelled but still didn't refund at least for the FOOD! It was written as delivered. How can a whole Bolt rip off its clients! Who are you serving?

There's no support! They mention it everywhere in the "help" section and it's nowhere to be found. Like what is the actual heck with you? I get delivered botched food and I complain about it in the review and they specifically ask to go to support section, but it's not there! There are a lot of good things to be said about the app, with shiny interface and all, but get the basic functionality first, and add the bells and whistles later. This is how it's done in any proper development environment

Just uninstalled forever. The delivery guys usually take orders from several other apps at the same time. In the GPS map, you see them taking order from other places and delivering, all while they have your food. I guess the other apps pay better or something so they give them the priority. The support never fully reimburse you, just 2 EUR. Last time they didn't even reimburse me because I didn't want to receive a order that was already traveling for 1 hr with the delivery guy thru the city.

I am honestly 5min away from deleting this app. If I order food on Wolt, I can just relax and wait. If I order food using Bolt it's like a russian roulette of food delivery, sometimes its great other times it's insanely frustrating and useless. And on the times it's frustrating good luck getting through to the customer support, breaking through the robot assistant and getting an actual person to help is a chore and once you do get an actual person they take ages to reply.

Sadly, happened twice that the moment I am about to pay for my order with a discount, the discount is removed. Makes no sense, if you don't want people to utilize the discount or promos then why add them and tricking people in to ordering right before finalising and changing the price. Really disappointing. And getting help from an actual agent guttering through the bot is even more challenging

The service is awful... My food waited 1 hour to be picked. the food is soggy and not delicious. i work in restaurants and this app makes it so hard for restaurants to be able to provide decent food experience and fair reviews towards their food. Moreover, this service is really bad for a company that has a slogan as fast delivery in their app description. work on your terms and conditions for couriers also. They tend to be careless about the order and time frames. i won't order again using it

Pluses: Cheap, the company makes major discounts in the regions they are trying to expand in. Minuses: 1. Automated support which makes no sense in local or English languages. Poor AI implementation. The support line won't help you even with bolt+ subscription. 2. Couriers commonly don't know either English or local language, which makes communications difficult, even with the automated translation feature. 3. Faulty deliveries only allow for partial refunds, which is unfair.

You have an option to order with delivery when there are no couriers available, only you don't know that. After 30 min when my order was done I contacted support to request refund because I'd rather order from other app than receive cold food. Support "helped" by finding courier, who delivered me.. surprise - stone cold food. Food reached me after total of 57min. No refund, not even discount for next order. I feel bad for restaurants and couriers. Thanks for nothing Bolt, uninstalled.

Thereâ€™s a problem with their couriers. Deliveries can be delayed by up to two hours from the original time because of a lack of available couriers, and they refuse to cancel the order. Sometimes you can manage to cancel it through support, but not alwaysâ€”and only after begging them. Basically, theyâ€™ve shifted the risk of courier shortages onto their customers instead of taking responsibility themselves. And now, they neither delivered the order nor refunded the money. They just donâ€™t respond.

Terrible experience with such delivery app, 2 orders cancelled, one by me because I waited for 4 drinks more than 3hours as no courier is able to take my order which has been prepared for 3hours, second cancelled by the shop. Bolt customer service dunno bot or person, get help is probably bot, wasn't able to respond to my message, and didn't react at all. Only after some time i demand refund again with less pleasant speech, it immediately cancelled my order and gave me refund.

This is the most disgusting delivery in the world. The most disgusting technical support that can simply be. In some cases, the delivery reaches 7 eur.They dont check who they hire for delivery and just take people from the street who dont know how to use maps or the phone. how much I communicated with my friends all the time the problem with this app and the delivery. Tech support just apologizes and doesn't help at all. Sometimes you are simply thrown out of the chat to solve the problem.

Worst app for delivery. i had a situation when the app did not take the geolocation. The customer support app did not want to help me with canceling of the order and also they did not want to put another address on the order. I got my money taken and did not received the food. Customer support stalled time for the order to be completed in order to tell me after, that the order was delivered and I cannot get a refund. Functionality of app: 1/5 stars. Customer support: 1/5 stars.

I ordered the food and it is supposed to be delivered in 20-40 minutes. However I waited for 2 hours and the courier never picked up the order. I contacted customer service in order to cancel the order and get a refund and the only answer I got was that they need to talk with the team in order to give a solution. 24 hours later I got the notification that the food was delivered. But I didn't receive anything. I am pushing the customer service for a solution, but nothing.

Since bolt pivoted to ai, its been harder and harder to order food normally. For some reason the delivery is getting ever slower, to get help with your order is a chore, only chatting with an ai bot repeating the same thing over and over, and getting a human to look at it takes an eternity. Plus most of the food pictures in the app are ai generated so you dont actually know what your food looks like.

I placed an order with the wrong address that was already placed in the app and I couldn't change it. I asked the app for help changing my address and they said they couldn't.The courier didn't want to come to the new address, because it was too far away and when I said I would come pick it up. The courier said he couldn't wait. They placed the order delivered, which actually never reached me, which cost a lot, they took my money, food and tips. They said they couldn't refund the money.

Pointless to use it as they mark up everything. You can call directly most of the places and they'll charge you less and they'll organize free delivery. Wolt is by miles better in terms of pricing, deals and customer support.

Unreasonably expensive. More than often there is no courier to deliver the order. Customer care is hard to reach. First you need to talk to a bot, which just repeats what the app already shows. Additionally the app is too slow. Most of the times the location of courrier person does not update correctly. The customer service bot just makes it harder to get things resolved. Extremely bad experience.

I'm currently having a really unpleasant experience with this App. one of your courier delivered my order to a wrong address. I'm calling his attention to it, instead of solving my issue by retrieving the order and deliver it correctly he blocked me from contacting him. this is unacceptable..

Extortion by Bolt Food's courier. I entered the correct delivery address, but their app changed it, sending the courier to the wrong location. The courier then demanded extra payment to complete the delivery. When I contacted support, they refused to refund me and blamed me for their appâ€™s failure. This is extremely unprofessional and unfair. I do not recommend using Bolt Food.

worst experience ever. Waited more than 2 hours 30. The delivery was delayed, it took 2 hours to get my order delivered. Could not cancel it at any point, got a cold mushy mess. ended up trowing it in the trash. Customer support was beyound useless. Asked to place a complaint and was completely ignored.

The main problem isnâ€™t with the app, but with the service itself. Itâ€™s unacceptable to deliver cold food. Therefore, you should not deliver more than one order unless it adds less than five additional minutes to the delivery time. Your welcome.

We have ordered from bolt and tried to order food from chowpaty your payment authorisation does not get through, the payment on delivery does not get through so why are you running this app? and wasting our time it is not the first time we are experiencing this issue but we will not use your app anymore they are many more apps which we can enjoy.

The food was prepared promptly, and was waiting at the restaurant to be picked up. The delivery estimate changed from 1, to 1:15, to 1:30, to 1:45, to 2... It failed as an estimate, as it has no reference value. We waited for 90 mins, then the order was cancelled. The failure is entirely the platform's, to allocate drivers. Upon complaint, the platform told me to give the order (i.e. the restaurant) a poor rating for this experience, which is putting the blame on their restaurant partners.

Customer service has gotten worse for years now. I've been ignored after complaining about an issue with an order that was done incorrectly even with clear instructions. Don't recommend if you want your issues to be properly dealt with.

Curiers now deliver at least 3 orders everytime in the same run and somehow I'm always the last destination, making my food cold. An order that normally would take 10-25 minutes in the past now took over an hour multiple times.

AWFUL EXPERIENCE... Choose Glovo or Wolt instead. Careless, incompetent couriers. I ordered food and gave the exact address and the specific name of the cafÃ© + added a note asking the delivery person to call me when they arrive. They didn't call me, and they supposedly left the package at a random gate. I ran out into the street, but I couldn't see my order anywhere. I tried to call the delivery person twice, but they always hung up on me. I contacted customer service... no solution, money back

Some restaurants have a 30% discounts forever, while prices are still higher than when visiting personally... Some other "restaurants" are just a copy paste of another place (so they appear on the app twice under different names). The support is non existent, just an AI. Overall a pretty bad experience, sometimes.

Allows restaurants set 3 hours delivery and if you order unaware, they say it is too late to cancel. Even though the delivery is 2 hours away. Don't give your money to a company that doesn't care about you.

My order kept getting pushed back likely to rain approximately for 1 hour after it was ready at the restaurant. Arrived stone cold. The help page promised that they will push my order up , give it priority. Guess its a lie. Beware, cold food , constant delays, your arrival time gets pushed by 10 minutes each 10 minutes! No actual support , probably an ai bot.

The service has become unacceptable. My last order arrived cold, and support arrogantly claimed they "can't do anything" because it was "within the estimated time"- which was a flat-out lie. When pushed back, they simply stopped replying. In just the past two weeks I've received the wrong order twice, and food regularly arrives 40-50 minutes late because drivers waste time picking up other orders. Support is a joke they brush you off, then ignore you completely.

Horrible communication with support. Item missing in orders and all you get refunded is 1â‚¬ return (7% of order worth). After a complaint, all you receive is a same generic message repeated 3 times. Even the 1â‚¬ refund disapears in 2 days and you get nothing ðŸ˜‚ So a big middle finger to you dear Bolt. You used to be good, now it's time to order from competitors.

I'm for over 2hrs speaking with BoltFood Support about a missing item in my order. One AI bot immediately closed the conversation 2 times without asking me anything. I was passed to a human, again I was asked nothing but I proactively sent photos of the receipt and food, and described clearly the issue. The conversation was closed again with a generic, copy-paste answer that says nothing. I paid for an item I did not receive. I wasn't refunded. Bolt ðŸ‘Ž

Complete disregard for users. My wife ordered food with Bolt Food. The courier couldn't find the address and refused to deliver, but the order got charged anyway and marked as delivered, with us getting no food. Customer support was only able to offer a "have a pleasant day" in exchange. Amazing with how little governance and ownership both the app and the riders can get away with. Never ordering anything with them again.

They delivered the wrong order. After I returned it I was told my order will be delivered later but it never arrived. I asked for a refund and the support told me they will contact me when they get in touch with the restaurant. Unfortunately that did not happen until the end of the day. Overall poor customer service.

App is fine. Rest is not. Recently ALL of their drivers use other apps and take 5 orders from 5 places before getting yours to you. 2 days in a row either cold or destroyed by pilled orders in a bag. Avoid at all costs.

I keep receiving spam emails from this app with the subject "Maria from Bolt". I have tried to unsubscribe multiple times through my phone and PC and both times the link just says "sorry technical error" and I keep receiving reminders that I need to order food from bolt. This is very unprofessional. There are 4 identical takeaway apps in my city and none spam like bolt. Do NOT give them your real email

Worst food delivery App. Even after being a Bolt Plus member food delivery is inconsistent with couriers not available for pick up for more than 1-2hrs after food is prepared by restaurants. And support response is the worst I have ever seen. WIthout helping in cancelling the order expect response such as "it will be automatically assigned and have a lovely day". Worst customer service.

Couriers constantly don't read descriptions and go to wrong address. Food gets lost and you spend time waiting, contacting support, and getting no extra compensation nor food. This service is getting worse every year
Absolutely atrocious customer service, egregious price creeping and full of false advertising and so called special offers. Do yourself a favour and buy locally or order directly from the restaurant.
Customer Support is terrible (AI bots which keep saying please wait), didn't care about missing order once. It's the worst app for food delivery.

Ordered food at 19:15 and it only arrived as 20:55. It was already cold, and when I contacted support for help they didn't provide any useful assistance. But... After a few hours they reached to me and refunded me the price of the order.

The service has become very unreliable the past year , sometimes is ok and it arrives on time other times it takes ages to arrive and they even deliver other orders before yours so your food has been sitting in the restaurant ready for 30 minutes or even more . I'm considering uninstalling.
the customer service is the worst, when there is an issue with an order and it's not compensated. And btw the phone number that they have listed here, doesn't work.

the app its really bad now, i waited 2 hour to the order to recived it and after i tried to cancel it and spoke with the support they said that you cannot cabcel order cause its pickedup , the order pickedup 35 min ago and still need 40 to arrive !!!

worst customer service i was never helped and it was an urgent issue. their system changes delivery time after removing the cancellation feature. I immediately tried to get help but I was ignored till my order came and I got no response at all. no help was offered. I wish I could attach screenshots. am deleting this app today. should have known Bolt has the worst services in kenya

good app. idk whether the discounts are from the app or the restaurants but on discount the food is not the same as when it's not discounted. also wish there was a way to send feedback to the restaurant on the food.
I received the wrong order and it wasn't fully refunded. The support was awful. more recently the courier stole my order and it was very difficult and slow to get a refund. I'm deleting the app.

Avoid it, you will be forced to pay for items you did not order. After ordering several times, one of the shops replaced items from my list without my approval. After reporting it to bolt food support they refused to help nor issue any kind of compensation telling me to leave a feedback for the store. In other words, using bolt food the shops are allowed to force you to pay for any items they want and bolt support will not help you. Use it at your own risk because you will not be compensated
Waited 3 hours for delivery, wanted to cancel, they did not give my money back and I ended up without food. This app is a scam.
Not working, all I get is the image screen. How to use it when I also have a subscription. I tried it on three devices, it works on neither, I reinstalled it and everything.

title: Jigsaw Puzzles - Puzzle Games
description:
Get an engaging jigsaw puzzle experience with one of the worldâ€™s most-downloaded puzzle games from a top developer!

Jigsaw Puzzles is an addictive, easy to play game for seniors with over 13,000 FREE cute HD pictures. No points, no gimmicks, and no missing pieces, simply enjoy hours of fun putting jigsaw puzzles together to calm down and relax.

Created by game experts and played by millions of puzzle lovers worldwide, Jigsaw Puzzles helps you exercise your short-term memory and concentration, while passing the time with real jigsaw puzzles and without taking up as much room.

Indulge yourself and plunge into the wonderful world of HD jigsaw puzzle games for seniors! Enjoy piecing new bright magic jigsaw puzzles together every day!

Our free puzzle game for adults includes a large number of beautiful images of different difficulty puzzles from easy to hard. The game difficulty is based on the number of jigsaw puzzle pieces, which should be put together.

A free jigsaw puzzle app on your device encompasses a wide range of HD pictures and is as challenging and attractive as real puzzles. If you are excited about playing puzzle games, you will definitely love our Jigsaw Puzzles for adults!

Being a stress relieving and relaxing game, daily jigsaw puzzles for adults will help you to take a break and get rid of the everyday routine.

Discover the colorful world of jigsaw puzzles for free!

Features:
â€¢ Tons of jigsaw puzzles for free with beautiful, high quality pictures. Choose from a variety of categories such as Colors, Flowers, Nature, Animals, Art, Landmarks, Hard picture puzzles and others
â€¢ Daily free puzzle games for seniors. Get a new HD jigsaw puzzle every day and try to solve it
â€¢ Coins for exclusive content. Get coins by completing HD jigsaw puzzles. Spend them to get exclusive puzzles and collections!
â€¢ Mystery jigsaw puzzles for seniors. Challenge yourself to reveal what is hidden in a picture
â€¢ Daily updated gallery. Youâ€™ll never run out of free puzzles in our jigsaw box
â€¢ Helpful hints. Use Hint to match the next piece to the picture puzzle if you are stuck
â€¢ From 36 to 400 puzzle pieces. The more pieces, the harder your jigsaw puzzle games become
â€¢ Rotation mode. Turn on rotation, make the free jigsaw puzzle game more tricky!
â€¢ Custom backgrounds. Choose your favourite appearance to solve free jigsaw puzzle games for seniors with more pleasure.

Make every day relaxing and entertaining putting jigsaw puzzle pieces together! Enjoy our free puzzle games!

Terms of Use:
https://easybrain.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
https://easybrain.com/privacy

scraped_reviews.content: Commercial every 2 pieces on average. No joke. Had 3 different 'breaks' while listening to a normal 3.5 minute song. I recently found myself realizing I'd made it 3 whole pieces without getting one this time! It's BEYOND frustrating. No wonder they have such a high scoring rate on the play-for-point apps. No one would put up with this otherwise. And if it glitches, get ready to start all over again! HIGHLY recommend finding a different puzzle game if you don't want a bazillion commercials.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We extend our apologies if our actions ruined your gaming experience â€” it was never our intention to make you feel this way. We appreciate your feedback, as it will allow us to evaluate and improve our ads policy. Meanwhile, we remind you that our ads are always skippable. If you are unable to skip them you are most welcome to contact us.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this puzzle and would give it 5 stars except on a new phone I lost: "categories" " my puzzles" and " in progress". really disappointed. 11/7/25 thank you for restoring the tabs mentioned above. I'm still missing the ability to lock the puzzle in place so the puzzle frame moves as I am trying to move a piece to a specific location. if that could be corrected I would be happy to add a couple Stars. thank you in advance for your help
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Itâ€™s great to hear that you enjoy the puzzle! We appreciate your feedback regarding the missing categories and the locking feature. Your experience is important to us, and weâ€™ve escalated this matter internally. Thank you for sharing your thoughts, and we hope you continue to enjoy your puzzling adventures!

scraped_reviews.content: I played this regularly last year. Revisited it today after a year and experience was painful. There's an Ad if you take more than a few seconds between putting pieces together. I like to do the 400 piece puzzles. I have just finished one puzzle and suffered through OVER THREE HUNDRED ads. In one game. I thought these guys knew what they were doing but these guys have lost it. There are better options available if you like puzzles. This one is unplayable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your honest feedback. We understand ads can be disruptive at times. Theyâ€™re what keep the game free and help us continue improving it, but weâ€™re always exploring ways to make gameplay smoother and more enjoyable.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this game but ever since one of the recent updates, they got rid of the categories section. Now, you have to do the puzzles on the main screen that are already set to a certain size, or do the daily puzzles. That's it. You used to be able to do any puzzle you wanted, any size you wanted. I haven't played this game in months because of this and have actually found a new jigsaw app to play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback! We recognise the importance of the categories section for puzzle selection and acknowledge the impact of the recent changes on your experience. Your insights matter to us, and weâ€™ll take them into account. We hope you'll consider giving the game another chance in the future!

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this puzzle app. So much so that I purchased the no ads version. I got a new phone months ago and now it's not the same. I can't choose puzzles, categories, or how many pieces I want to do. I have to do them in a certain order and can't advance unless I do. I open it occasionally to see if maybe it's back to normal, and it's not. Super disappointed, especially since I purchased the no ads option. ðŸ˜’
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for writing a review. We are extremely sorry to hear about your experience! Please contact us through the Help in the app at your earliest convenience. We'll do our best to solve this problem.

scraped_reviews.content: this used to be fun, but the number of commercials is ridiculous, and the farther you get, you realize you are redoing the same 15-25 puzzles over and over and start to get on your nerves! they keep doing updates, but it is not to add new puzzles. The amount of ads you are forced to view is getting worse. you will spend more time watching ads then doing puzzles
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Greetings! We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts. We understand that ads can interrupt your fun, and weâ€™re sorry for the inconvenience. title: KakaoMap - Map / Navigation
description:
KakaoMap will show you the fastest routes in Korea!
With KakaoMap, you can find everything you want in a map app,
from directions to hot restaurants and local attractions, and more!

â–º You need to find the fastest route?
âœ” Fastest and most accurate map
You will get the latest information updated within 24 hours for cars, public transportation, walking and bicycle.
âœ” Navigation system included
No need to install a separate navigation app. When you search for a route, KakaoMap will give you navigation directions right away.
âœ” Comprehensive search within one search window
You can find all information you need using one search window including a bus number, a bus stop, a specific place, etc.

â–º When you need local information
âœ” Recommendation just for you
KakaoMap will provide useful information based on your current location including hot restaurants, keywords, spots, events, etc.
âœ” Search areas on the map
You can see search results right away by using the "Re-search this area" feature on the map.
âœ” Places suggested by data
KakaoMap analyzes big data on visitors and provides information on a specific place by age, gender and day of the week.

â–º Need more systematic maps?
âœ” Favorites organized by group
You can manage Favorites by group and indicate them on the map. Folders can also be followed and shared.
âœ” Road View
After searching for a route, you can see the place you plan to visit in advance using the Roa View feature.
âœ” Realistic 3D Map
We provide a more realistic vector-based map which can be rorated or tilted 360 degrees. It looks very real!
âœ” Real 3D Sky View
When you want to search a three-dimentional map, you can use 3D Sky View.

â–º Other convenient features
âœ” Favorite places shown on the map
âœ” Real-time bus information to help you reduce wait time
âœ” Real-time traffic information to help you find fastest routes
âœ” Convenient and accurate subway map
âœ” Use Friends Location when you want to know where your Kakaotalk friends are
âœ” Hyper Accurate Bus services for Busan, Chuncheon, Mokpo, Ulsan, Jeju and Gwangju

â–ºMore convenience for Watch users
âœ” Try KakaoMap on your Wear OS devices
 You can view arrival infos for Bus & Subways, get guidance info for Public Transporations and Bike

KakaoMap loves to hear your suggestions.
âœ” Questions & Feedback
- maps@kakaocorp.com
"- Kakao Customer Service Homepage 
(http://www.kakao.com/requests?locale=ko&service=59)"
- Customer Service: 1577-3321
- Developer: 1577-3754

----
â—¼ï¸Ž Service Access Permissions
[Optional Permissions]
- Location: To search the current location and nearby
- Mic: For voice search
- Storage(Photos and videos): Photo upload
- Phone: For navigation
- Camera: To take photos
- Appear on top : To show car navigation widget on top
- Notification : Departure & Arrival Alarm, Bike Navigation, Recommendation and or other information related to user activity
- Nearby devices : Kakao i
- Physical activity: Used to share your real-time location with selected friend.

* You can still use the service even if you don't give the above permissions.
* For Android under 6.0, you can't individually manage app permissions.
Please check with your device's manufacturer if its OS can be upgraded.
If upgrade is possible, we recommend that you update the device to 6.0 or higher.
----
Developer Contact Info:
1577-3754

summary: KakaoMap will take you to nice places!

scraped_reviews.content: it actually is a really good app. a must have when traveling Korea. the only problem I have is especially in Seoul. can you please list the number of the stop. in the subway station on the app it tells you to get off on ........ stop. but I can't read Korean so it gets a little difficult. if you include the station number it would make it much more user friendly to everyone.

Pretty useful but many things are not translated in Korean. Also finding an address without using hangul is often not working for me. So it takes a while to get used to everything and find everything. I would recommend to get familiar with this app before traveling to Korea and not while standing at the airport after arrival to find quickly the next bus to Seoul as I did it ðŸ˜…

It's okay but can't really be used on its own, even in Korean it seems to be pretty bad. For example, if you want to enter an address, even if you put the exact address or if you search really common things like "x station" it won't even give you the closest approximation. You have to use it in conjunction with another app. I was making do for a couple weeks in Jeju but it has no f*ng clue what to do in Seoul. Switching to another app to try my luck there.

If you're in South Korea this is a MUST have. Just download it now. Update: There are some user experience gotchas with this app. First, the default mode for directions does NOT update your location on the map. It shows no updates! You can get it give GPS real time updates...how?? Click around randomly...I can't reliably repeat the behavior. This is bad. Second issue: naming places. On map hover menu, "add place" is PUBLIC places. Not what I would expect. Private locations are hidden. bad desig

This is one of easiest app to use for navigating korea. Either you want to use as car navigation, public transport or by walk, it help you alot. I particularly like the alarm function on public transit. with this function I don't need to constantly check for announcements about stops. I get real-time reminders for transfers and destination.
Since few days kakao map is not properly working! it is not showing all addresses like a naver map ! when you enter an address, it says there is no such an address here !
Definitely use this app instead of the other navigation app that works in South Korea. This is much more foreigner friendly.
Useless. Not accurate. Must switch to naver maps
this is a great app, you can save places and get excellent directions

Great experience, very detailed mapping of public transportation, routes and the locations. Was very helpful during my stay in Seoul, Gyeongju and Busan. One improvement which can be done is to add English translations of as many key places as possible. As a non-Korean speaking individual, we search in English and the locations never pop up. We have to enter Korean translation of the location for it to search. It would make it more lucrative for foreigner usage if English search can be added!

I love this app. It's UI is cleaner and more intuitive than the competition. It connects well to other apps. I also applaud the English language support which is great for tourists and expats. **But please include a faster toggle between English and Korean. Maybe in the maps settings filters. It's too deep in the settings, when asking for help from a Korean or showing the address to a taxi driver. Showing the address in both English and Korean would be helpful.**

Great app, very detailed mapping. Restaurants and Cafes are all well captured in the system. However, they could have changed tab labels at the top of the map e.g. "Restaurants", "People's Favorite", "Cafe" etc into English as well if the user has selected English in the settings. Or else, for an English user like myself, I have to depend on guess work to know what each tabs means, or spend the extra time using Google translate to translate it. Other than that, it's a very intuitive app,ðŸ‘ðŸ»

This is the ONLY GPS app I use. I absolutely rely on this app for work-EVERY DAY. I wish there was more customization with the Favorites Folders, and I want to be able to customize the advisories, to toggle them on and off, individually. I appreciate the helpfulness, but at times it can be TOO helpful - Sometimes, I just want it to shut up - I don't care to know where every Frequent Animal Crossing is. I would gladly pay, as long as it is not a subscription, if it meant more premium features.
bad app design also map and directions are dangerous
great app to use in South Korea.

English is my 2nd language. Even if you choose the English Language is not fully on English it's partial. Is not tourist friendly and that's not welcoming. It's frustrating to navigate the app when you have no idea what you are clicking and looking. And if you are not a resident it's hard to add payment. Google maps still more helpful. I hope they open the doors more to visitors.
it's good to use for travel and for navigating

Favorite Map Service in Korea. I like that I'm able to see/find bus stops and get pretty accurate times of the arrival. I also like that I can call Kakao Taxi through this app. One thing I don't like is that I'm unable to search for locations in English on my app, unless it's saved. My app is in English though. I don't have really any other issues/complaints. I share many locations with friends through Kakao and other message applications.
needs to give so much info just to use it. terrible app.

No English menus, e.g. the icons on the map about restaurants, cafes, attractions, etc. are in Korean although I set everything to English. Same for Hyper Precise Bus menu, etc. As a foreign tourist I need everything in English, ok? And need to be able to see the local public transport offline. I get it that the transport is fluid/dynamic and services might not be accurate while offline, but sync can be done overnight through WiFi. And need to find ATM's as S. Korea is a cash based economy.

Needs a little bit more English support. And above all else, it needs to stop searching for things on the opposite side of Korea. If I'm looking for EMarts in Busan, I don't want the map to jump to Pyeongyang. Would be nice if intercity and express buses had their times listed. Everything else is fairly functional.

No navigation cues, all key information is in Korean. It doesn't even understand an address if it's in English. Mostly had no help from the app when I used this for biking and had to rely on locals pointing me in the right direction. Would also help if the app actually tells me my present location and gives me verbal cues instead of me having to check the screen for directions

Works well if you know Korean but English translation and English recognition still needs lots of work. The navigation is very weak and inaccurate when indicating multiple floors or levels. Needs much better navigation guidance notification. Completely lacking accurate turn by turn navigation guidance for walking and it doesn't even have route recalculation feature. Lots of guessing.

super great navigation app! i was in seoul for only a week, and this app was such a lifesaver, helping me get around the subways, find museums/national monuments, and just explore my surroundings. if you don't know how to read hangul, then i'd recommend you find a different app that can translate things into english. but if you can read hangul and want to challenge your understanding, then this app is the best!! ^__^

It would have been very hard visiting Seoul without this app. Nice job! One suggestion though (from a tourist point of view) : sometimes is not easy to find locations by name because some places only have their Korean name. It would be great if that could be improved so a location can be found by searching for it using multiple names.

Used this on my trip to korea. It was the first time I used the subways and busses there, but it was very convenient with this app. It even alerts you when it is time to get off and starts to remind from one station before your destination arrives. Thanks to this app i got to conveniently use the busses there without any problem

This app is really helpful! (thanks for the creator of this app) for all of the foreign people who will visit south korea, but their's one thing problem in this app, although its translated in english but the information of bus/subway is not translated in english this is the most important , i really hope you will fix this one cause you will help many foreign people to give a smooth flow in their vacation.

Even though I'm not Korean and cannot read Korean, I'm able to navigate really well using this app. It tells me when to get on the bus and sends me reminders when my stop is coming. I gave it four stars instead of 5 because I for me, having an English would make it even simpler to use.

App isn't very English friendly. I need to use Google maps to search for things then copy paste into this app for Navi. Search sometimes doesn't seem to work as well vs. gmaps, but I don't read/speak Korean so maybe I'm using it wrong? Navi is better than gmaps in terms of finding routes, but a little stressful. I.e. nav instructions of subway/bus stations is only written in KR , but are in EN on the map, so I switch between views and rely on GPS positioning.

If you check my edit history this was originally 5 stars with a glowing review but as always they ruined their own app. Uninstalling and sticking with Google Maps which never has issues and always works. They messed up the app so IT NO LONGER SHOWS WHERE YOU ARE ON THE MAP in real time while trying to navigate to a place! Ruins the whole point of the app! ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤¡ Finishing my journey using Google Maps to track my progress with no issues and sticking with that app from now on.

I absolutely love the app. I find it more intuitive than Google maps and being able to see the buses move on the map in real time is amazing. I wish Kakao maps covered other countries! Some parts of the app (for example the notices) are still entirely in Korean, which is the only reason I didn't give it 5/5.

OK app, but got much worse recently. 1. Put the route button back in the lower right hand corner. It's super annoying for large phone users to have to stretch to the upper right hand corner every time we want to hit it. 2. Give us an option to not make the home tab pop up every time we open up the app. This is super annoying, and I can't disable it. 3. Stop putting ads everywhere. This app has been progressively adding more ads recently. The old versions had less ads.

Probably, the best navigation guide in South Korea. It would be even more handy if people in charge add some minor features. For example, I am in Jongno-gu, Seoul right now and after a while I need a pharmacy in Gangnam-gu. In such cases, it would be better if the app also shows 'pharmacy', 'ATM', 'convenience store', etc on the top of the searchbox for the searched district, not only for current location.

This app sucks! Here's why. Almost every time I choose a route, I see the projected cost for tolls. Yet every time it re-routes me, without asking first, and I pay 3 times more than anticipated. I can't even count how much money this dumb app has cost me. DON'T RE-ROUTE WOTHOUT MY PERMISSION!!!

I think you and naver map should collaborate. If you guys shared ideas, the map will be more helpful/detailed. I hate when I have to switch between the apps. I can read/understand(%) hangul but for other foreigners it would be difficult, especially they're only here temporarily. If there's an option, most foreigners will not be dependent on google map while they're in S. Korea because I think you're map combined with naver is better. Also, I'm irritated when my SAVED FAVORITES disappears and I ha

I have a note 9 and although this app was working fine all of a sudden it doesnt show the map properly. It will either be grayed out or be very zoomed out(even if you zoom in it doesnt give detailed map markers or show roads etc). It still locates me and gives me the directions to go places if i type it in but the map doesnt show. Please fix.

scraped_reviews.content: The single most counter intuitive maps app I've ever seen, you'd be better off using a paper map. Nothing is named, it doesn't show which direction you're facing, it doesn't show you moving, it doesn't tell you which bus to catch. The only positive thing is it tells you when buses are supposed to arrive

Getting around in Korea is an absolute breeze with this app. It's so convenient in how it informs you of all possible transit options. I love how it let's you know when to get off so you're at the right place. A must-have if you're traveling in Korea!

scraped_reviews.content: Great addition to anyone travelling to Korea. Includes times to the next bus/train and prices which is really handy when topping up your T-card for using public transport. Wouldn't have had as smooth a holiday without it's recommendations to local attractions and food. Wish it worked outside of South Korea!

Developers finally added an option to make the nav voice chatter significantly less (I don't need to be told a story about how the speed limit is 60 kph 5 times before the speed camera) but removed the option to change the nav language to English. Awesome. Back to Naver I go.

Great app for location finder in South Korea. Only issue is that even though I chose English as the language setting, all the road names are shown in Korean. And some places that I find in Google Map can't be found in this map with the given name. No idea why.

Navigation directions rendered and station names are correct. However, the app is not friendly for an individual who cannot read korean. I would suggest using other Apps that provide English context to navigate in Seoul for the moment until the language capability for this App is enhanced.

Generally a Google map user, but since Google map doesn't work well in Korea, I've downloaded both Naver maps and Kakao maps to aid my trip in Seoul, Incheon and Suwon. I found that Kakao map is the best and most accurate in general. However when following calculated routes it can get a bit confusing at times, e.g. arrow pointing in the wrong direction

It's a real mess with a very partial english translation. It's slow, doesn't give much information and there is a lot of place that it doesn't find. Even so, it's stil' better than Line map (Which wasn't hard ...)

Very helpful map in Korea . I want to give it 5 stars , but i gives 4 , because I'm a Motorcycle Rider , this app send me to Highways a lot . Which is not good at all . In korean law , motorcycle riders can't go in highways . I've already setup my settings on app that i have motorcycle , but still sometimes, not all times , sometimes i find myself in highway. Otherwise , this app is very good . I love it .
love it, wish it had an option to switch to miles, but I understand why they don't

Korean-only UI with no english options. Foreigners are better served by the Naver Maps app. Edit: apparently there's a way to switch languages, but the way to get there is not evident to english speakers; changing rating from 2 to 4 stars.

scraped_reviews.content: Was useful while it worked for about a week, then with no updates just suddenly would never connect for directions saying "check network connection" (there's nothing wrong with the network connection) and became completely useless. I did have to use it with Google maps though, since none of the bus stops or train stops it gives are in English. Now I just have to rely on Google maps over my obviously working network connection ðŸ˜

scraped_reviews.content: Mixed feelings about this app. I have set the language to English, but when I get the travelling instructions it shows the names in Korean, which doesn't help with station names or direction of transport. I have thus not used it. It however shows options when Google maps says it can't.

When I used the app's road view, it turns out the pin doesn't stay still at the moment of swiping the map below the street image, making it difficult to use if you want to explore the map without moving from the current pin location. For me is rather disappointing

title: Vita Mahjong
description:
Vita Mahjong is an Exclusive Puzzle Game of Tile Matching. We are thrilled to present the mahjong  game that combines innovation with classic gameplay. It offers large tiles and a user-friendly interface compatible with pads and phones. Our goal is to provide a relaxing yet mentally engaging gaming experience, particularly focused on older adults.

At Vita Studio, we have always been dedicated to crafting mobile games designed for seniors that bring back relaxation, fun, and joy. Our repertoire includes popular titles like Vita Color, Vita Jigsaw, Vita Word Search, Vita Block, Vita Sudoku, and more.

How to Play Vita Mahjong:
Playing free Vita Mahjong game is simple. Just aim to clear all the tiles on the board by matching tiles with identical images. Tap or slide two matching tiles, and they will vanish from the board. Your objective is to match tiles that are not concealed or blocked. Once all tiles are eliminated, it signifies successful completion of a majong game!

Exclusive Vita Mahjong  Game Features:
â€¢ Classic Mahjong : Staying true to the original gameplay, it presents traditional card tile sets and hundreds of boards.
â€¢ Special Innovations: Besides the classic, our game introduces special tiles that add a fresh twist to the classic mahjong.
â€¢ Large-Scale Design: Our mahjong games feature large, easily readable text sizes to alleviate the strain caused by small fonts.
â€¢ Active Mind Levels: A special mode designed to sharpen your mind and improve memory abilities in the mahjong games. 
â€¢ Customizable Scoring:  You can enjoy free classic mahjong games without a timer and any score pressure.
â€¢ Super Combo: When you consecutively match mahjong tiles during the game, you will unlock special experiences.
â€¢ Helpful Hints: Our game provides free useful props, such as hints, undo, and shuffle, to help players overcome challenging puzzles.
â€¢ Daily Challenge: Take on daily practice to collect trophies and improve your classic mahjong solitaire game skills.
â€¢ Offline Mode: Full offline support lets you enjoy Vita Mahjong anytime, anywhere, without needing internet.
â€¢ Multi-device: Optimized for pad and phone, ensuring everyone can enjoy the classic mahjong game.

Vita Mahjong is a versatile game made for those who love tile matching games. Download Vita Mahjong and start your mahjong dynasty now!

Note: This is a puzzle game in the style of Mahjong Solitaire. It does not contain the rules of traditional Mahjong or other types of solitaire or card games. The term â€œMahjongâ€ here refers solely to the visual style of the tiles.

Contact us via: support@vitastudio.ai
For more information, you can:
Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/vitastudio
Visit our official website: www.vitamahjong.com

â€¢ Customizable Scoring: You can enjoy free classic mahjong games without a timer and any score pressure.
â€¢ Super Combo: When you consecutively match mahjong tiles during the game, you will unlock special experiences.
â€¢ Helpful Hints: Our game provides free useful props, such as hints, undo, and shuffle, to help players overcome challenging puzzles.
â€¢ Daily Challenge: Take on daily practice to collect trophies and improve your classic mahjong solitaire game skills.
â€¢ Offline Mode: Full offline support lets you enjoy Vita Mahjong anytime, anywhere, without needing internet.
â€¢ Multi-device: Optimized for pad and phone, ensuring everyone can enjoy the classic mahjong game.

Vita Mahjong is a versatile game made for those who love tile matching games. Download Vita Mahjong and start your mahjong dynasty now!

Note: This is a puzzle game in the style of Mahjong Solitaire. It does not contain the rules of traditional Mahjong or other types of solitaire or card games. The term â€œMahjongâ€ here refers solely to the visual style of the tiles.

Contact us via: support@vitastudio.ai
For more information, you can:
Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/vitastudio
Visit our official website: www.vitamahjong.com
summary: Relaxing Vita Mahjong: Classic Tile Matching and Offline Puzzle Games!

scraped_reviews.content: The adds are broken. after every puzzle, you get an add, and then can't get back to the game. scraped_reviews.content: Playtime is a little less time than the adverts. Solve a puzzle, then wait through a three segment advert, and finally get to play again. "Worst app ever. They confirm that stock is available, we make the payment, but when itâ€™s time for delivery, they just refund the order. It's so frustrating and time-consuming dealing with Flipkart.I ordered an iPhone 16,which was supposed to be delivered soon, but there's no tracking update on the app. I filed a complaint,and they said there might be delays due to logistic issues. While I don't mind paying a service fee for the convenience of online shopping, I do believe this fee should be fully refundable, especially when a return is necessary due to a fault with the product itself. I recently had to return a damaged item. The return process was efficient, and I was promptly refunded for the product's cost, but the platform fee was not included in the refund. This feels unfair

Now a days it's very difficult to do shopping from Flipkart, the reason is there will be no brand label,no tags, not proper packaging. The thing is if you will go to order 100 items, 90 out of 100 has to be returned because of quality issues. Only you can order groceries but sometimes you will be dissatisfied with that also. I am writing the review after 5 years of using this app.

Very poor service. I wish I could give zero stars. title: Skip - Fund Your Business
description:
Go further and unlock your full entrepreneurial funding potential with Skip! Skip is here to help you successfully discover, apply for, and maximize your chances of getting your business funded. Here's what you can expect in Skip's new and improved app for small businesses and entrepreneurs:

â€” Find the latest funding opportunities, including grants, loans, and other financing options to help you grow your business, whether you're just starting out or you already have a successful business 

â€” Turn on Skip's grants auto apply to have Skip automatically apply for grants on your behalf every single month

â€” Ask all your business growth and funding-related questions on our new Skip AI

â€” Maximize your chances of receiving funding opportunities by tracking funding on your Skip Dashboard and writing your applications with Skip AI. You'll get automatic feedback and tips on grant applications. Plus you can request 1-on-1 assistance from Skip experts.

â€” Watch our latest videos on small business and funding help, including access to app-only and exclusive content

â€” Stay in the know on all things small business through our latest blog posts

â€” Join the fastest-growing community supporting entrepreneurs and small businesses in the US

title: Gurukula Stories Comics Audios
description:
Includes stories from Mahabharata, Ramayana, Panchatantra, Tenali Raman, Vikram Vetala and more. Includes Shlokas from Bhagavad Gita and more.
Catered to children and adults in the 21st century. 

INSTRUCTOR LED COURSES | COMIC BOOKS | AUDIO BOOKS | STORY BOOKS | PICTURE VIDEOS

The app connects users to like-minded characters and helps them develop a deep righteous attitude for life.

We have taken original epics in Samskritam and abridged / translated them to maintain purity and avoid distortions. 

Audio Books
Narrated as short 10 minute chapters in an easy to understand style. Pop open the app and let us narrate a chapter for you - whether you are driving, cooking or simply retiring for the night.

Comic Books
Specially produced comic books catered to the 21st century. Over 40 colorful images per chapter carefully designed to engage the user in Indian Culture. Thousands of users have learnt Indian Epics through the Gurukula Comics.

Story Books
Translated directly from original texts. Written in simple english. Moral Values from every story are identified and explained to help the user get grounded in values. Learn life by reading one story a day. 

The Gurukula app is thoughtfully designed to cater to a diverse audience, offering valuable content for users of various age groups.

One new chapter will be published every week.

Along with my kids, I enjoy the app as well. I suggest everyone pay to subscribe the app and support such a nice endeavor. I have tried many many apps to teach my family, and this is the one I am going to keep installed on my tab. Thank you Sriram ji and team for this amazing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the kind review Nithya Ji. Happy that you're liking the app. Do share it around. Thanks for your support.

scraped_reviews.content: Very very nice app. In love with this. Very informative even for adults about our culture. Specially love the Gita in 3 minutes partðŸ˜. I woulf like to give few suggestions for future implementation. 1. Please release app with majority of all regional languages so that it would reach out to everyone easily, as everyone would not be knowing English. 2. Please include Vishnupuran, Shivapuran, Garudapuran, vedas, acharyas(madhva and ramanujar info along with shankara) in comic form only
scraped_reviews.replyContent: DhanyavAdaH Madhuri Ji - We will take your suggestions for future content production. You can also gift the Gurukula app to your friends and family by going to https://gurukula.com/gift-to-someone

scraped_reviews.content: The stories are well narrated in Sanskrit. I started learning Sanskrit language very recently for which these narrations are helping me even more. The audios are assisting me in a great way. Really appreciate the app. Need to explore more.

Sriram, My kids loving this app. I appreciate your efforts, initiative and your creativity in making this app for the children to learn about our epics in a modern way.. Best wishes for more and more success.. I would definitely recommend to my friends. ðŸ‘ðŸ‘

scraped_reviews.content: The best app around to learn/understand Mahabharata, very lucid, excellent narration, wonderful experience. Recommend listening / playing for your kids if you want them to learn the ways of life and how much the Mahabharata has to offer in understanding the laws of Dharma and Karma.

Both my kids are using this App to learn about Mahabharata. They intend to use it more for future learning. The way these stories are written makes it easier for any person specially kids to learn. The course material has been designed with effort and research by a passionate team of people who really care about bhartiya samskriti.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Namaste Bandana Ji Thanks for the kind words. scraped_reviews.content: Easy, handy and exceptional. Using this App ever since the android version was launched. Audio chapters across the board are crisp. My favourite however is 'Bagawat Gita is 3 minutes'. Very neatly presented, re-ordered and broken down to explain each word. Isn't it wonderful to be able to understand every word and contemplate on what Lord Krishna spoke at the comfort of our homes, with our handheld devices! Thank you Sriram MahodayaH ðŸ™
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the kind words Akila bhagini. I am glad that you are enjoying the app.

scraped_reviews.content: Gurukula is an amazing app. developed by Sri Ram Raghavan to introduce Indian culture to children and to refresh our mythologies that some of us adults have forgotten. The app has a choice of languages.You can read or listen to the audio book. You, your children and grand children will be happy you got this App. Gurukula. Dr.Parameswaran

scraped_reviews.content: We love this app. The content is well presented, stays close to tradition, insightful and supports children and adults to understand our Itihasa. The classes conducted by Gurukula team are truly one of the best. The storytelling reminds me of sitting and listening to pravarchana in temples or gathered around Ajji or tatha. The teachers are patient, kind and engage the children. I am truly happy to have come across this app and classes. Do not think twice. Just get onboard.
My daughter took the Mahabharata in 20 weeks course. The experience that I got from this app was amazing. I learned new things that I have never known also. Grateful to the teachers & their services
We all love the story narration. Great app for the kids. This keeps them engaged when we are on the road while they are learning about Ramayana, Mahabharatha in detail! A win-win.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
DhanyavAdaH for the wonderful review Lakshmi ji. Please share the website WWW.GURUKULA.COM with your friends and family.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a very nice initiative to inculcate our little ones with ancient epic knowledge in this fast growing digital world.....but it would have been far better if offered in more Indian languages.....rather than only English.

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent resources to learn our culture. From everyday slokas to Bhagavad gita chantings, from stories and comics to audiobooks, everything were perfectly structured. Thanks for creating such a wonderful source.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the great review Revathi Ji. Glad you are looking the content and the app. You can also gift the app to your friends or family by going to https://gurukula.com/gift-to-someone

scraped_reviews.content: The content is awesome. The main thing we liked is audio part. Even small kids can listen and understand the content. After listening they can try reading same story in English and Sanskrit. And lot of stories which are useful for kids and they can understand our Indian tradition in right way.

Sriram Mahodaya developed an excellent app for everyone to learn sanskrit from the beginning. It is very very helpful to everyone. App ckntains basic words to start with, simple stories to learn with, subhashitam, slokas,etc. Which other app can really give such tremendous Indian ethics which we are missing now a days. Dhanyavadah Mahodaya ðŸ™ðŸ™

I never write reviews and this is my first review. This is best app to learn our culture. Parents should encourage every kid to go through, lot of information and 3 minute Gita is excellent and I really appreciate Sriram Garu for bringing this. Thanks a lot for Sriram Garu.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Namaste Sandhya Ji Thanks for the kind words. scraped_reviews.content: As someone born and raised in America, this app is what I need to learn about my culture and religion. Specifically, I love listening to the 3 Minute Gitas. The word-by-word breakdown helps me understand the correct pronunciation, and the explanation of each word lets me know what it is I am actually saying. The interpretation often puts the sloka in context of present day, so it is clear how one can apply the meaning to their daily life. Thank you Sriram mahodaya for spreading this knowledge!

It's a great app for all, including kids, to learn hindu epics and all moral stories. Great audio, great stories, and last but not least, quizzes for each and every chapter, which ensures our understanding. Loved the app and recommended for all.

My daughter loves reading Ramayana and Mahabharata in the Gurukula app. Thanks a lot to Sriram swamin and his team for bringing the great, glorious and divine Indian epics The Ramayana and The Mahabharata to our next generation in the modern times through this app. Not only Indian epics, but also much needed moral values through Thirukkural and other Tamil stories is very nicely explained in audiobooks. I will highly recommend this app to all.

Beautifully narrated stories which can be understood by children too. My daughter and myself loves to listen to the stories especially Mahabharata. Yet to listen to other stories. Deeply appreciate the efforts of the narrator.

Lots of effort and excellent presentation. Care has been taken to give the facts n history in the sweetest way focusing on what the kid should learn for their life. Sriram's corner is interesting n informative. The team working on slokas can come up with more Adisankarar slokas for kids. Panchakams and ashtakams. It's a nice gesture to give free access for one month during this pandemic lockdown. All the best sriram ji.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks much for the kind review Srimahatripurasundar Ji. Yes we are in the process of adding a lot more Adi Shankaracharya Shlokas.

scraped_reviews.content: compelling and vivid storytelling holds my attention 100% of the time. no chance for distractions. The content is laid out so it's highly memorable. Kudos Gurukula. Keep it up and give us more content to enhance our grounding in Sanatana Dharma

I also love the reciting of Mahabharata, Ramayanam and all others done by Sriram MahOdayaH. This app is one of the best app for learning our Indian culture. The app design of the app is utamam ( excellent ). The only feedback I can give is adding comprehension questions after the each mahabharata. Thank you for all that you do. From, Raghav

scraped_reviews.content: The app has beautiful stories from Ramayan Mahabharat and lovely short sanskrit stories. The Gita is so well recited. It's a great app for beginners to learn and understand sanskritam. There is a regular update of content. It is an app definitely worth having for all sanskrit lovers.
Simply excellent! The graphics, written content, audio, points system - all the features blend well together to form this superb app! Keep up the great work!! A big THANK YOU to the team!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: dhanyavAdaH for the kind review Soumya bhagini. I am very happy that you like the app.

scraped_reviews.content: The Sanskrit app and stories are great for students and teachers. scraped_reviews.replyContent: DhanyavAdaH Jagannatha mahOdaya for the kind review.

title: Gauth: AI Study Companion
description:
Gauth is the #1 AI study companion powered by newest AI model! Trusted by millions of users, Gauth offers unlimited answers for all subjects. Try Gauth for all your learning needs!

Key Features:
â–º ACCURATE ANSWERS, STEP-BY-STEP
Compared to other homework helpers, Gauth is faster and more accurate at solving homework problems, especially with the support of Gauth AI Pro. Problems could be solved quickly within a few seconds, and all answers are accompanied by animated instructions and detailed explanations.

â–º AI LIVE TUTOR, VOICE & WHITEBOARD
Stuck on a question? With AI Live Tutor, ask by voice anytime and see problems explained clearly on a live whiteboardâ€”just like having a personal tutor by your side.

â–º DEEPTHINKING, INSPIRE YOUR LEARNING
Powered by Gauth AI, integrates the advantages of multiple AI models and solves your problems smarter and more deeply. With Gauth AI, we hope you can get inspired and learn efficiently.

â–º MASTER ALL SUBJECTS, ALL GRADES
Not only Math questions, Gauth could now solve all different levels of problems in Physics, Chemistry, Biology and more.

â–º REAL EXPERTS READY TO HELP 24/7
As a strong and resourceful homework solver, we have professional experts and dedicated experts ready to help you 24/7 with multiple subjects, including Math, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. All experts are available to solve your problems anytime and anywhere, offering clear step-by-step explanations. With Gauth, you can easily understand and master different subjects.

â–º EASY TO USE, HOMEWORK IS COOL
Simply take a photo of your problem, and Gauth will recognize it and crop your question automatically. After uploading, our experts will provide solutions in a few seconds with well-formatted answers and explanations. With Gauth, we hope you can find homework is also fun and easy to understand!

â–º STUDY TOOLBOX, ALL-IN-ONE APP
Packed with essential tools like Reading, Writing, Focus Mode, and Calculator. Whether you are struggling with tough books, writing, distraction or calculation, get text simplification, grammar check and math calculation in one app. Gauth helps you to supercharge your academic performance.

â–º SUBJECTS COVERED
- Math
- Biology
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Others
â–º MATH TOPICS COVERED
- Math Word problems
- Algebra (Real Number; Arithmetic; Set theory; Expression; Logarithm; Complex Number)
- Function (Linear; Quadratic; Polynomial; Exponential; Rational; Logarithmic; Inverse Function)
- Geometry (Plane & Solid Geometry; Algebra & lines; Lines & Planes in Space; Transformation)
- Trigonometry (Trigonometric Ratios; Law of Sines; Law of Cosines; Reciprocal Properties)
- Calculus (Derivatives; Integrals; Limits; the Tangent/Area Math problem)
- Statistics and Data Analysis (Probability; Data Representation; Poisson/Normal Distribution)
- Matrix (Matrix Algebra; System of Linear Equations & Matrices)
- Logic (Reasoning & Proof)
â–º Want to level up your learning? With Gauth Plus, you will get:
- Unlimited answers and explanations
- High accuracy in answers
- Advanced AI tutor with clearer live explanations
- Access to 20M+ tutorial videos
- A question bank of 100M+
- 24/7 tutor help
Terms of Service https://h5.gauthmath.com/terms
Privacy Policy https://h5.gauthmath.com/policy

STAY CONNECTED
- Tiktok: www.tiktok.com/@gauthofficial
- Website: www.gauthmath.com
- Email: support@gauthmath.com

summary: Ask anything, get right answer

scraped_reviews.content: I have been struggling with Spanish for awhile now. I am in an online program. I have never really understood how to do the ending verbs. I am also very confused anytime it comes to English class. this app has helped me understand and finish my Spanish class completely. I was a third of the way done with English, now im almost complete. I fully understand the courses, and use this app to double check my answers. It is free too!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your awesome review! We're thrilled to hear that our app has helped you conquer your Spanish and English classes. Keep up the great work and happy learning!

scraped_reviews.content: Really helped me out with my math work. The AI helper is really good if you ask it for a second explanation. The first explanation it gives is normally quite difficult to understand, but apart from that, it's really been useful for recapping subjects and learning new things. Sometimes, the AI does explain it in the most difficult way possible,but if it was to use casual grammar, this could be even better. Thanks, Gauth, for helping me out. Oh,and I don't know if the app works for other subjects
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the awesome feedback! We're glad we could help with your math work. We'll continue to improve our AI helper for clearer explanations. Stay tuned for updates on other subjects! ðŸš€

scraped_reviews.content: Overall pretty easy to use. it's flexible, provides information and is quite convenient for completing homework. One of the problems is fact that they removed some features overtime, like being able to snap multiple pictures to provide the ai scanner for more context on the question without trying to cram it all onto one picture. My main problem is the limited use without premium. I understand that it takes money to run the app but you have to remember that the majority of users are students.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your insights and understand your concerns about feature access. We are committed to supporting students and will consider your suggestions for improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: Gauth AI is by far the best study app Iâ€™ve used. Itâ€™s fast, accurate, and explains problems step by step instead of just giving answers. The camera scan works even with handwriting, and it covers math, science, and more. It feels like having a tutor available 24/7, but at a fraction of the cost. Way better than similar apps like Photomath or Brainly. Highly recommend to any student!

I have been struggling with Spanish for awhile now. I am in an online program. I have never really understood how to do the ending verbs. I am also very confused anytime it comes to English class. this app has helped me understand and finish my Spanish class completely. I was a third of the way done with English, now im almost complete. I fully understand the courses, and use this app to double check my answers. It is free too!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your wonderful review. Weâ€™re thrilled to hear our app helps you understand Spanish and English better. Keep up the great work, and happy learning!

scraped_reviews.content: It helps me with my algebra the most,gives me exactly what I need to understand what I'm supposed to be learning and gives me an easy guideline for guided notes even on the assignments I do. It tells me how to get to the answer and helps me better understand the assignments,quizzes and exams I go through in classes. Overall, a 5/5 app if you're struggling with math or any class really,but especially math,and even a tutor wouldn't be able to help like this app does. Blessed be,thank you, Gauth!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to help you understand algebra better. Keep enjoying your learning journey with Gauth.

scraped_reviews.content: Recently, the app keeps giving me wrong answers. It will do something entirely different from what the math question clearly states to do. I will tell it, and yet it still gives me wrong answers. Not to mention these annoying as hell adds. Every time I click a button, you start begging me for money. If you're that desperate for money, then stop using it on an app that apparently doesn't work anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We take this seriously and want to improve your experience. Please contact our support team at support@gauthmath.com with more details so we can assist you better.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a very awesome app. BUT, please, pretty please, make us be able to take atleast more than like, 6 photos a day? I'd love to be able to do my work quicker. If y'all make this app not like the others where you have to pay a lot, people would recommend you guys everywhere
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your enthusiasm and support. We appreciate your feedback on photo limits and affordability. Your suggestions inspire us to improve and help more students learn efficiently.

scraped_reviews.content: It's been giving me wrong answers lately when I do math even though I am showing the question with good camera quality and it just doesn't seem to click.. when I do ixl, they always get the answer wrong and it really irritates me. please fix this problem, I know that it is still in work or I am probably wrong but it gets very irritating at times.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We take this seriously and are working to improve accuracy. Please contact us at support@gauthmath.com with more details so we can assist you better.

scraped_reviews.content: It's literally awful about %65 of the time it gives you the wrong answers, it takes forever, there's a ridiculous amount of adds, it never wants to focus when you're taking a photo of the question and it always says it's blurry, and when you try to correct it it just argues with you and you STILL end up with the wrong answers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your feedback is taken seriously, and we are working to improve our app. Please contact us at support@gauthmath.com with more details so we can assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: this app has been amazing and has been helping me to self study without a teacher for long , but i just noticed it's not free anymore and I can't use it without a membership which is hard since I'm relying on it , i know it's fare to make money of it for produces , but it would be less inconvenient for us students to use
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind words and support. We understand your concern and appreciate your feedback. Your learning experience is important to us, and we will consider ways to make it more accessible for students.

scraped_reviews.content: If you are using this for math, don't. I have never had such an issue with getting homework help when using literally any other app. Gauth never remembers what I even TYPE IN as the problem, and when I try to correct the bot because I want help with my homework to understand it, it'll just tell me I am confused!!!
